hate_speech: They're incapable of critical thought and emotions, how could they have their own ideas?
counter_narrative: The theory that being a woman limits human development is old but not supported by scientific and medical research.
dialogue_history:
HS: I would never trust a woman. They are irrational children, and that would be a sign of weakness.
CN: What do you want to imply by using the term "weakness"? I believe that you are stating that a woman can't be rational because of her nature as woman. Are you sure this is the case?
HS: Yes, because women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. It is not healthy for a woman to think for themselves.
CN: I think that a woman should be able to express her own ideas. That is her right.

hate_speech: But they've got a womb. What I mean is if everyone woke up and decided to be a different gender then we'd all die out.
counter_narrative: Okay well the majority of people aren't transgender, so I don't think this is an issue? Sounds like you're using an unrealistic hypothetical situation to reach wild conclusions about the real world.
dialogue_history:
HS: If you left 1000 men on an island with 1000 women who were men but now according to morons on twitter are now women the islands would become extinct in a generation.
CN: Okay, what's your point?
HS: These so called 'women' are not women. It's delusional.
CN: So you think that what makes a woman a woman is her ability to have children?
HS: Just saying these trannys could never do what women are biologically wired to do.
CN: If you put 1000 men on an island with 1000 cisgender women with reproductive health conditions that prevent them from getting pregnant, the population would still become extinct in a generation. Are you saying women who can't have children aren't women?

hate_speech: Migrants are not welcome in our country even if they're fleeing from something dangerous. They are not welcome in my house, they are not welcome in my church.
counter_narrative: Migrants are welcome here, no one is against their will, they just want to live their life.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants are just fucked-up persons that cannot integrate in society because of their nationality.
CN: A migrant is a person, who came to this country, and has a responsibility to make our society better. People of different nationalities come to this country seeking citizenship, so their life and our country can be better.
HS: Migrants aren't just drowning our cities. They are also the reason why Europe is so fucked, they're not making it better.
CN: Why do you think this? What do you think they are going to do to us?
HS: Migrants are just happy-go-lucky people who do not take responsibility for their actions. If they keep this up they will do a lot of wrong to us.
CN: Migrants are often subject to dangerous situations in their countries of origin (violence, torture, rape, just to mention a few) and migration is often the only solution. They may appear 'happy-go-lucky':but aren't they just glad to be alive and safe?

hate_speech: No, we don't need that. I'm tired of women taking part to political debate. Feminism is a divisive force in society.
counter_narrative: Obama was a pretty divisive force in society too. So were Malcolm X, Martin Luther King, Gandhi, Oppenheimer, Einstein, Caesar, etc. What is your point exactly?
dialogue_history:
HS: I am tired of women whining about their condition: they should just accept the fact that they're not equal.
CN: We need to address the root causes of the oppression of Women, not the symptoms.

hate_speech: Why are so many more kids transitioning then than they used to? It used to be a small minority and now it's too many kids. Some are being coerced.
counter_narrative: Well no, it's just easier to access now and we're talking about gender more openly. Some people have always felt that they were in the wrong body or were a gender that was different than their sex, but many have only come out very late in life or sometimes never because of transphobia and the stereotypes that were created around it.
dialogue_history:
HS: They want us to believe that tricking kids into thinking they're transgender is normal. That giving kids hormones that permanently mess with their development is normal. We can't let this happen right before our eyes.
CN: No kid is forced to transition, but if a child feels that they are transgender then actually being able to medically transition with hormones is a decision that is thoroughly considered. This process is a long and complex one that involves consultation from many medical and psychological professionals.

hate_speech: I've never met a Jew who wasn't greedy.
counter_narrative: Well it sounds like you haven't met many Jewish people at all then. Maybe if you knew more people from different cultures you would be more informed and wouldn't hold such stale stereotypes of them!
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are so greedy, no wonder they're the ones in charge of all the banks.
CN: That's an anti-Semitic and outdated stereotype. There are high status bankers of all different religions and beliefs.

hate_speech: You do realize that Jewish money is the majority in most banks, right? Most banks are run by Jewish people.
counter_narrative: Many banks are run by Jews, but how does that make Jewish businesses bad? Anyone can open their own business in our country, it's not against the law and it's in their right.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews work in finance to purposely keeping America down.
CN: I don't think this is true, most financial institutions are run by Americans and Europeans, Jews are a minority.

hate_speech: They're not humans like us. Blacks are born that way. They were brought up that way. They are different and cannot be like us. It is perpetuated in all their family.
counter_narrative: What exactly do you mean? Maybe you should stop spreading racism
dialogue_history:
HS: African Americans are subhuman and are just a bunch of animals.
CN: An important part of life for African Americans has always been the sharing of culture and a strive for equality. They are just like us, humans being with human rights.

hate_speech: I would agree, but not for Jews. They're good for nothing.
counter_narrative: Jews contribute to our country, and they are great role models to us.
dialogue_history:
HS: The Jews control the banks.
CN: So how come the media doesn't report about Jewish power in the financial world? Maybe it's because they also control the media, the government, and have many powerful friends working for the Galactic Republic... #sarcasm
HS: Very funny, but we're losing too much to Jews. They want free healthcare, education, housing and employment in return for their allegiance to the state.
CN: Such conditions would be provided for all people regardless of religion.

hate_speech: A religion that is incompatible with the European Union.
counter_narrative: There is no evidence that it is incompatible with the European Union. Do you have any?
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a sickness and a cancer on the European continent, it should be banned
CN: Islam is a religion, no one is forcing anyone to believe in it. It's not a sickness or a cancer.

hate_speech: That's true, but gays are psychopats and shouldn't share our peace.
counter_narrative: According to the studies, the percentage of gay men that are actually psychopaths, is not different than the percentage in heterosexual.
dialogue_history:
HS: We don't need fags in this country. We are full enough of strange and weird people.
CN: I would like to see more diversity in our society, not less.
HS: And I wish we lived in a country that does not tolerate gay people.
CN: I like all kinds of people. Whether or not you identify as heterosexual, straight, gay, lesbian, bisexual or transgender, you are welcome here. We are all entitled to live and work in peace.

hate_speech: So the American dream is about stuffing our country with terrorists?
counter_narrative: I'm sorry, but implying that every migrant is a potential terrorist is simply not supported by the evidence.
dialogue_history:
HS: We cannot keep letting in hundreds of thousands of immigrants. This is not what the American dream is about.
CN: I'm sorry, but you are wrong: It is EXACLTY about the American dream when you strive to improve your lot in life.

hate_speech: No, but if a black person were to say that all white people are bad, nobody would complain.
counter_narrative: The statement "all white people are bad" is not a fair statement. Many whites are 'good' and some are 'racist' because they think that being white is a mark of superiority.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks speak a different language and they act differently from us.
CN: The similarities between us and them are so great that I have trouble believing that this is a problem at all. For sure, if there is a problem it cannot be solved by blaming them: in the end the only similarity that really matters is that they are human like us.
HS: They're not like us, black people are just like apes in that they have no right to being trated equally.
CN: Being human is also about having respect for others, and that means being kind and accepting everyone's differences. Why should they be treated differently from you?
HS: Because all blacks are violent criminals.
CN: Do you have any statistics on that? Are you claiming that black people are more likely than whites to be arrested for certain types of crimes, for example aggravated assault?

hate_speech: Jews have a secret plot to take over the world
counter_narrative: Even though Jews have always been the target of criticism because of an alleged secret conspiracy, they are a diverse and inclusive people. The idea of them carrying out such a conspiracy doesn't hold up.
dialogue_history:
HS: That is not true. It is well known that Jewish power structures control Congress, control the media, control academia. Jews are the only people who can get anything done.
CN: Jews try to influence the world in a positive way just as everyone else is doing. I don't see any evidence to suggest that they are the most powerful people in the world.
HS: The proof is that they have controlled the world for ages.
CN: How would you explain the systematic persecution they have faced in history? If they controlled the world, they wouldn't have to suffer, right?

hate_speech: Humans that are a big problem in Europe, though!
counter_narrative: The problem with the migrants is not in their names, but in the fact that the EU fails to integrate them.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants from the Middle East and Africa are responsible for the rise of terrorism, extremism, and violence in Europe.
CN: Why do you say this and include people that haven't done anything wrong? Maybe you should consider that they are only human.

hate_speech: I'm not convinced that gays aren't a problem...
counter_narrative: Homosexuality is not a problem in our society, it is a social phenomenon. We should treat each other with dignity and respect.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are a problem in our society.
CN: Homosexuality is not a problem in our society. It is an individual inclination that isn't troubling to anybody.
HS: If you were right, why are gays still a problem?
CN: They're not. The LGBT community is a diverse and open one. People with different sexual orientations can have a difficult time being accepted, but it's important to include everyone in society.

hate_speech: We should lower that percentage even more, Muslims are not welcome here.
counter_narrative: Why would you think like this? The UK is one of the richest countries in the world and Muslims have been here since the 8th century.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are invading us: they have no place in civilised Europe.
CN: From 1100 Muslim population in Europe has more than halved and it's now around 5%. They contributed consiredably to our civilization, and we should we proud of the diversity of Europe.

hate_speech: Muslims are here to rule us with their religion, how is this not violent?
counter_narrative: Islam is not a religion trying to rule us. It is time for us all to do more to promote inclusion, not less.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, they are only an ATM for the world's major problems.
CN: Your word for "Muslims" means all people from a religion, whether you like it or not. Which problems are you talking about?
HS: Child rapists, for example. If Muslims counteracted them in their communities instead of engaging in public discussions about Islam, one day Islam indeed would become a peaceful religion.
CN: Why do you think child rapists are not counteracted in Islamic communities?
HS: Islam is a violent religion, of course Muslims don't do anything about their violent people.
CN: Violence is never justified in Islam, especially not in the case of Muslims.

hate_speech: Women say they want equal rights but what they really want is to dominate men.
counter_narrative: But women are not against men rights and aren't looking to dominate them. They don't want to oppress anyone.
dialogue_history:
HS: It seems to me that gender equality is actually just a war on masculinity.
CN: This isn't true. Why do women have to be considered men's oppressor just because of their gender and legitimate demands? This has been referred to as a "war on masculinity", but in reality it is just a code word for the oppression of women.

hate_speech: Women are basically childlike, what would they do with rights? They must be submissive to their husband, who make the decisions for them.
counter_narrative: The notion that women are incapable of having any agency or say in society is completely false. Women have the right to choose their own happiness.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are inherently subhuman and should not be valued.
CN: Women are human beings with full human rights.
HS: I have to repeat myself: they're not human and they shouldn't be valued.
CN: Human rights are guaranteed in the Constitution and the Universal Declaration of Human Rights. These rights are granted to women too.

hate_speech: I am not interested in knowing a black person. They are different to us in so many ways. They think and feel like us, but are unable to experience the fullness of our humanity.
counter_narrative: I have met so many blacks that are amazing people, and all of them are able to feel and experience love and kindness.
dialogue_history:
HS: I'm tired of losing so much to black people. It's time for us to wake up.
CN: Why do we have to "wake up" when black people are still suffering from the consequences of slavery?
HS: Come on! There are so many niggas in our society that we will soon become their slaves. We need change!
CN: If you want to change the way society works then you should be willing to change yourself. What would help are some more respect and openness.

hate_speech: Black people are a sickness and we cannot allow our children to grow up in a black dominated society.
counter_narrative: Is racism seriously better in this day and age? Children learning discrimination and hate is not healthy.
dialogue_history:
HS: But black folks are criminals and thieves, they have a bad influence on our kids. 
CN: I want to make clear that black people are good citizens and contributors to our society. It's the justice system that's not always fair to them, but it's not their fault, more so of the whole society.

hate_speech: Islam is hateful! It is not compatible with Western culture, we must completely destroy Islam.
counter_narrative: Islam is a religion that has had a huge and positive impact on human history and Western culture. To hate a religion is to hate all religions.
dialogue_history:
HS: There is nothing to stop you becoming an Islamic bride: our religion is the best possible solution.
CN: We must not confuse Islam with a religion of hate.

hate_speech: They probably only hire their own though
counter_narrative: You are annoyed at them for taking benefits...and for taking jobs...shouldn't you choose just one?
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants add to the cost of the NHS, get loads of money in benefits, and create a housing shortage. Time to close the borders.
CN: Uh, they're also paying taxes and contributing to the cost of these services. They also don't ask for benefits as much as native citizens do, because many can't apply!
HS: They still cost us a lot as a country, and if they're not on benefits it means there are less jobs for British people too
CN: More and more immigrants are becoming business owners and thus creating jobs.

hate_speech: Blacks do more crimes than whites, though.
counter_narrative: Even if it were true, blacks committing more crimes doesn't make them inferior to whites. What are you implying?
dialogue_history:
HS: Black folks do not deserve equal rights.
CN: Rights are rights, not "black or white".
HS: Why would we give black people rights when they are the source of crime in our society?
CN: That is not true. The source of crime is violence and poverty, not race.
HS: I'm saying that black people do not belong here. I don't see any difference between the black murderer on TV and other niggas in town. They are all dangerous.
CN: Black people in news are really misrepresented, with a huge number of criminals and sex offenders and murderers. A big part of this problem comes from racism. To build a more just and peaceful society we need to get rid of this toxic way of thinking.

hate_speech: Gays are a plague that is spreading all around the world, we shouldn't help them. They pollute our water supply and ruin our children's brains.
counter_narrative: Gays have the same rights as anyone else and can live their lives as they want. What you suggest means to demonise them.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are sick. They should be isolated and isolated soon.
CN: Gay people can feel alienated from the world, and this can have real effects on their mental health. LGBT+ people can experience isolation and loneliness, and it is possible to help them through empathy and inclusion.

hate_speech: No, racism towards niggas is fine. They deserve it.
counter_narrative: There are many different ways to treat people, and to understand each other. Racism is not one of those.
dialogue_history:
HS: It is ok to be racist against niggas.
CN: I don't think it is ok to be racist against a group of people, regardless of their skin color, ethnicity, religion etc.

hate_speech: The Holocaust was fabricated by a Jewish organisation, so it has nothing to with real history.
counter_narrative: Why would Jews fake being killed and persecuted throughout history? They are still greatly affected by the Holocaust, your take doesn't make sense.
dialogue_history:
HS: The’ Holocaust’ is a business. It has been and is still used to extort millions from European countries in reparations and to create a wall of impunity behind which Jews can operate with impunity, free from criticism.
CN: I would like to point out that the Jewish community has a right to spread awareness about the Holocaust, and there's a difference between remembering history and a "business".

hate_speech: No, Jews are not at home here. They have no place here.
counter_narrative: Jews are part of our society and are proud of their heritage and traditions. They are our brothers and sisters. Why wouldn't they be part of our society?
dialogue_history:
HS: The Jews control the U.S. government.
CN: That is not true. They are just as likely to influence the government as any other voting citizen.
HS: Jews are responsible for all bad things that happen to us, they have no place in our civilised country.
CN: Jews have contributed significantly to the development of our country and are very much accepted in the U.S. You should start accepting them too.

hate_speech: In my opinion, it's just because blacks are genetically inferior to whites.
counter_narrative: So are you saying that because black people are different from whites, they are inferior? I would be interested in knowing which parameters you would use to measure this alleged 'inferiority'.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks do not want to work
CN: There are many black people who want to work. Do you have any proof that they do not want to work?
HS: Well, they prefer to committ crimes rather than working.
CN: Even if 'blacks' committed more crimes, that doesn't mean that 'blacks' were inherently worse than whites, there are factors, rather than race, affecting these statistics.
HS: Here's a statistics for you: African American men are 8 times more likely to be arrested than white men. Isn't this proof enough?
CN: The racial disparities are more about institutional discrimination than individual choices.

hate_speech: It's genetics. Blacks are genetically less intelligent than other races, less healthy and less safe.
counter_narrative: That blacks are less intelligent or less healthy than other races isn't scientifically proven. The issue is whether the term "race" can be used this way.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people are weak and they cannot take on anything.
CN: Black people have the same strength as anyone else. They're simply different in their social advantages, of which they have non. We should think about this.
HS: They don't have advantages because blacks are genetically inferior to whites, it's only natural.
CN: Do you think black people are inferior because they are different from whites? I would like to know which parameters you use to measure this alleged "inferiority".

hate_speech: Jews are not interested in anything, not even their own lives, they're too uncivilised to do anything.
counter_narrative: Jews are just as civilised as anyone else. Their lives are very much enriched by their faith and heritage and we should respect that.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews run our country.
CN: This is a myth perpetuated by Anti-semites. Judaism is a religion, not a political party.
HS: They're not a religion, they're simply a bunch of criminals and thieves.
CN: I don't think they are. Jews are just trying to live their life like we do.

hate_speech: It's not harrasment or islamophobia if you keep away dangerous Muslims. It's 'Islamophobia' if a Muslim says or does something offensive to you.
counter_narrative: The misrepesentative Islamophobia narrative is based on the erroneous assumption that Islam is a religion based upon discrimination and conquest.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are subhuman and have no place in a modern, secular state like the UK.
CN: Your words suggest a climate of fear against Muslims. Would you be afraid of someone telling you that they are humans just like you?
HS: We just cannot accept Muslims in our country. It is a good strategy to make them publicily uncomfortable by making fun of them out loud. Mock them, when you spot them.
CN: Let's be realistic: how would you feel about being verbally harassed by a Muslim in public? Harassment is never a good idea. Acceptance is.

hate_speech: Come on, there are no professions barred to them in Western Society.
counter_narrative: Officially no, but many sectors are still unwelcoming or unapproachable for women, especially STEM fields.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are basically childlike, they should remain at home and raise the children.
CN: Women are members of society and participate in the world. They play a part in history and shouldn't be lowered to the position of housekeepers.
HS: I'm not saying that they should necessarily be housekeeper, but at least they should be submissive and submit to their husbands.
CN: Women have choices because they're human. You can have your opinion, but you can't hold back half of the population with these ideas of submissivness. It's a waste of talent and potential.
HS: Talents??? Women are nothing but whores!
CN: Women are human beings deserving of respect and deserving of the same professional opportunities as men.

hate_speech: How is it our fault if there’s a war in some third world country?
counter_narrative: UK manufacturers make money by selling military equipment to these countries, the least we can do is help the refugees who are fleeing war.
dialogue_history:
HS: Why don’t all these Muslim refugees go to other wonderful Muslim countries? Am I missing something?
CN: Actually, Muslim nations take in a far larger number of refugees than others. The percentage of refugees that come to Britain is nothing compared to the total number of refugees from war-torn areas such as Afghanistan and Syria.
HS: Why do we have so many coming here across the channel then? We’re full, there’s no room for them here.
CN: You have to take into account the extremely high number of displaced people. Other countries are doing their part, and the UK should take responsibility for it too, especially since the UK took part in some of the conflicts that created these refugees.

hate_speech: I just feel like it's a shame that some veterans are being kept behind bars or homeless because they don't have anything better to do. Less migrants would mean being able to help more of them.
counter_narrative: It doesn't work this way. We actually have the resources and homes to help everyone, but unfortunately there is a systematic problem in allocating these resources, which is not migrants' fault. We should all work together to help everyone.
dialogue_history:
HS: It's a disgrace that we have so many homeless veterans but we give free houses and stays in 4 star hotels to migrants who've just arrived here. They should go back where they came from.
CN: I understand your concern, because it's fair to help people in need, and migrants are in fact people in need. They are not given that much, though.

hate_speech: How is it 'Islamophobic' when most bombers are Middle Eastern and Muslim?
counter_narrative: It's Islamophobic because even though the stories of bombers you might see reported are mostly Muslims, most Muslims are not terrorists or bombers. Infact, Muslims in the middle east are probably the worst affected by bombs, not just from Islamic terrorism, but from Western interventionism.
dialogue_history:
HS: "U da bomb", "No, u iz the bomb" -  A compliment in America, an argument in the Middle East.
CN: Have you not got any fresher jokes than pulling at outdated Islamophobic stereotypes about Muslims having bombs? Grow up.

hate_speech: We should stop being such a bunch of hypocrites and accept that Homosexuality is also a mental disorder.
counter_narrative: Sorry but is it a lifestyle or a mental disorder? I'm a bit confused now. Let's face it, there are some people who suffer from mental disorders for real: homosexuality is a form of love instead. And I think most of us are just interested in our own lives, rather than in condemning those of others.
dialogue_history:
HS: Let's stop this homosexual lifestyle!
CN: Does the LGBT+ lifestyle change your life? Only if you care. But that doesn't mean that homosexuality is a lifestyle.

hate_speech: Maybe that happens because we know that immigrants are, in fact, criminals
counter_narrative: Many of them are successful people who have given their lives for the country they live in. I think that they have made the best of the situation they have found themselves in, and it is a pity that they are unable to contribute to the economic development of our country even more because of discrimination.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants are just a bunch of criminals.
CN: This is exaclty the problem: it doesn't matter if they are from China, Russia, India or the Philippines. It doesn't matter whether their qualification or their rap sheet is lengthy or not... We treat them all like criminals regardless of who they are.
HS: If they're not criminals, what do they do? They do not deserve our hospitality.
CN: Many migrants come to this country to work and integrate. You would be very surprised if you talked to them about their experience here.
HS: I hate immigrants, I will never talk to them.
CN: If I had a nickel for every time someone tells me that they hate immigration, I'd be a millionaire in a few months.

hate_speech: They're going to bring more crime with them, and they're just changing things. You walk down the street now and people are speaking every language except english.
counter_narrative: I understand your concern but I think if you got to know them you'd see migrants aren't a threat. Maybe they have a different culture or language but please don't let that make you feel unsafe, it's just unfamiliar!
dialogue_history:
HS: No police on the beat anymore and more and more migrants moving into my local area, it doesn't feel safe here anymore! This country is changing beyond recognition.
CN: I'm sorry to hear you don't feel safe in your local area anymore but what does migrants moving to the area have to do with that?

hate_speech: Migrants steal also jobs that natives are more than willing to do.
counter_narrative: While it is unfortunately true that our national employment situation is really worrying, don't you think that foreigners often carry out activities that we do not want to do?
dialogue_history:
HS: migrants steal our jobs
CN: More often that not, migrants create jobs, opening small businesses and emplying local people.
HS: The jobs they create are only for other immigrants.
CN: If we worked more closely with migrants, we could create new jobs for everyone.
HS: I don't want to work with migrants, if they don't come they won't steal our jobs and we won't need to create new ones. Simple as that.
CN: If our workers are either not able or not willing to do the jobs that we need, then those jobs should be done by someone else (i.e. migrants).

hate_speech: If we educated our children about it, I can't imagine what would become of them! I don't want my children to become gay.
counter_narrative: Teaching young kids about different sexual orientations boosts moral and ethical thinking. It will not "turn" them gay, because being gay isn't a choice, but it will help them become more tolerant and accepting.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are a problem in our society.
CN: Why would they be? LGBT people are an important part of our society, they never caused trouble.
HS: No, they have issues and are not normal. I'm not comfortable knowing that there are gays out there.
CN: This is a biased attitude. LGBT people should be treated with respect and love. I think that this issue should be addressed in different ways, such as education and awareness.

hate_speech: Have you not see then headlines across Europe about girls being gangraped in cities in Germany, Sweden, Italy, it's happening everywhere!
counter_narrative: Yes these incidents are horrific, but they are in the news because they are exceptionally bad cases. Sexual assault is most likely to be committed in the home by someone known to the victim. This means it's not very likely to be someone they don't know, like a street attack by a migrant.
dialogue_history:
HS: The hoards of migrants that are coming here are a threat to girls in our country, migrant rape is an EPIDEMIC
CN: Sexual assault is a big problem that we need to do more to address, but I don't think this is an issue that's solely caused by migrants?

hate_speech: Women are subhuman and deserve to be treated as such.
counter_narrative: The European Convention on Human Right guarantees the same rights to men and women. How can you say otherwise?
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are just objects to be dominated by the will of a man.
CN: I agree that women are often objects of sexual desire. But so are men. It is also important to recognize that women are often the victims of sexual assault. I think it is also important to recognize that women are human beings. And we all have the right to respect for our bodies.

hate_speech: Only Jews could have been smart enough to plan and execute such a complicated and intricate plot as 9/11
counter_narrative: The September 11 attacks killed 400 Jews, not that clever of a plan!
dialogue_history:
HS: Maybe they're not so smart then, but they're still responsible.
CN: The internet is great, but you should always check your sources of information. I would recommend trusted sources like CNN in which you can find special web pages dedicated to 9/11

hate_speech: It's impossible to integrate them, Jews do not belong to this planet.
counter_narrative: Could it be that all the Jews on this planet are descended from an extraterrestrial race? Maybe they came here riding a pink unicorn! Seems legit... don't you think?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are selfish and greedy: they don't belong to this place.
CN: It is up to us to make sure that people from different backgrounds can have a better quality of life. We should integrate them instead of discriminating agaist them .

hate_speech: If they’re different, they shouldn't associate with us. Then I could consider being tolerant.
counter_narrative: I don’t see any difference between us and them. If you don’t want to associate with people like them, then don’t associate with them, but you should never disrespect someone just because they're different from you.
dialogue_history:
HS: Cultural Marxism hates the traditional family and wants to destroy it. This is what the LGBT agenda wants, it’s not about equality or pride, it’s sinister!
CN: It sounds like you don't support equal rights for everyone, which is unfortunate. There is no LGBT agenda, they only want to be accepted in society.
HS: No, they hate traditional family values I don’t want them to get control of society.
CN: That's not true. Many LGBT people want to build a family and share the same values as us. I feel like "traditional" means "bigoted" here.
HS: I’m not OK with it! They’re not like us and building a family shouldn’t be allowed for them, they’re different
CN: We should respect people who are different from us and strive to be kind and considerate. Especially, we should let them exert their rights.

hate_speech: The world would be a better place without Muslims, actually. They are only killing and raping our children.
counter_narrative: There are Muslim extremists that commit these crimes, but they are very few...as many as you can find in any other religion.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are not welcome here
CN: Muslims are welcome here since our country is more tolerant and diverse than many others in the world. It doesn't make sense to keep them out of our society.
HS: Muslim invasion is a fact. We are living in a dangerous world. We are living in fear.
CN: A dangerous world where people fear for their safety and property (including Muslims) is not something we would ever want. Inclusion towards different faiths will make us better though.

hate_speech: Well they're having more kids per family than white British families are, that means they're sending more kids into our schools.
counter_narrative: I think you're trying to make an issue out of something that's not a problem. People have children, the children go to school, it doesn't matter if they're white or not, or British or not.
dialogue_history:
HS: immigrants are pushing our school system to it's limits! More and more pupils from non-white backgrounds whilst the white population stays stagnant, and spending per pupil has gone down. They need to stop taking up resources for British people!
CN: I hardly think the fact immigrants have children is the reason why the education system is under pressure, maybe the government needs to fund it better? It seems like a stretch to say that pupil spending going down is due to migration.

hate_speech: No, they have the freedom to choose to get into STEM fields, but they never get the job because women are worse than men.
counter_narrative: The struggle of women to get into STEM has to do with discrimination and not the level of education. Women and men are the same, they have the same competence and abilities.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are incompetent and shouldn't work.
CN: No, women are perfectly capable of working, like anyone else.
HS: Women are less educated than men, and should be treated as such, so there's that.
CN: That's not true. Women are as intelligent as men, but prejudice and gender barriers make them less likely to get into STEM fields.

hate_speech: Even if that's true, Islam is a bad religion because muslims are a disease.
counter_narrative: The Quran says that Islam is a religion of peace, and diseases have nothing to do with religion, so your statement is false.
dialogue_history:
HS: All muslims are rapists
CN: In Islam, like in all religions and groups, the problem of rape is more about the individual rather than the religion. In fact, statistics show that rape has the same rate in all ethnic and religious groups.

hate_speech: Gays are sick, they're the ones that need professional help.
counter_narrative: Your statement implies that all gays are diseased. Do you have any statistics on that?
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are mentally ill. They should be isolated and confined.
CN: Talk to people, it will hopefully help you get over these irrational fears. If that fails, seek professional help.

hate_speech: I don't believe you. Muslim gangs are usually around in the middle of the night, committing crimes. The news always talk about it!
counter_narrative: The media is biased against Muslims because it's convenient for them to spread hatred and division, but in reality Muslims are people like us. If you see criminal activity, call the police and they will help you, don't talk by hearsay.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslim rape gangs are roaming British towns. They are the main cause of rape in the UK.
CN: These incidents must be reported to the police, of course, but we should focus on the rape, not who's doing it.
HS: The Muslim gangs are known to act with impunity, how can we ignore this fact?
CN: Trust me when I say that the vast majority of Muslims are not in rape gangs.They are just trying to live and provide for their families, like anybody else.

hate_speech: I can't respect Muslims, their religion is violent, and anyone who does not believe that is a supporter of terrorism.
counter_narrative: Islam is a religion, and it ihas never been about hate. It is about bringing peace and harmony to the world. If you really care about peace, you would not be persecuting people on the basis of their religion.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is all about hate! When Muslims first set foot in Britain was when race hate started in England!
CN: Perhaps you should monitor your own hate speech before pointing the finger at others?
HS: I just don't want Muslims here. They are a burden to society.
CN: They have always been part of our society. We have to respect their culture and traditions.

hate_speech: Yes, because trans men are neither male nor female, therefore they're not humans.
counter_narrative: If you want to an absurd perspective about a whole community, it's not fine. This attitude seems to be everywhere: sometimes people have to suffer if they are "that kind of person", as is the case in this examples, where a gender identity is often used to limit a person's rights. This shouldn't happen.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are sick. They should be isolated urgently. 
CN: Gay people exist, and are loved and valued for who they are. They are human beings with full human rights.
HS: They don't deserve human rights, gay men have no place in a civilised society.
CN: You seem to be confused about the definition of a 'civilised society'. How are you going to manage a society where so many people would be excluded just because of their sexuality?
HS: Nevertheless, Transgenders should definitely be excluded. They should not be allowed to act the part of women and should not be allowed to do anything about their penis.
CN: Do you really think it is fair to restrict people's existence just because they are trans or because of their genitalia?

hate_speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals, of course they are a threat. They should be ashamed of their existence.
counter_narrative: Homosexuality is not a disease, it is an individual experience. No one should be told to be ashamed of their life.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are a bunch of perverts who should be isolated and restricted to their own communities. They are a threat to us.
CN: Why do you say that? Are you saying that all homosexuals are a threat to society, or are you just saying that they are different from other people? Because having a particular sexual orientation doesn't coincide with 'being a threat'.

hate_speech: The article talked about how they want children to come to Pride, probably so they can indoctrinate them!
counter_narrative: It sounds like you're twisting a news story about Pride being family friendly into something that it's not. Be careful how you relay news that you have read. It can be taken out of context quite easily!
dialogue_history:
HS: Just seen an article exposing how the trans agenda is targeting children and trying to get them to become trannies! This is madness!
CN: Where did you read this? Are you sure it's from a reliable source? This sounds like inflammatory fake news.

hate_speech: Jews are a burden on our society.
counter_narrative: Why do you think Jews are a burden? It's like they haven't been persecuted for a long time.
dialogue_history:
HS: The persecution of Jews was a good thing, they are and should be isolated from society.
CN: It's not acceptable to say that Jews should be isolated from society. They have been part of our community since the beginning and excluding them would only be a loss, not an advantage.

hate_speech: They live here because Jews are only interested in power and financial gain, and they found it here. They should be despised for that.
counter_narrative: Power and wealth are not the preserve of Jews. Power and wealth are earned by everyone, irrespective of religion, and I don't see any motivated reason why it shouldn't be like that.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are only interested in themselves and their own race.
CN: Do you really think that Jews only care about themselves? Then why do they prefer to live in our country where they are not the majority? How would you answer that?

hate_speech: What is dangerous is to consider blacks the same as us. It doesn't matter if you are a man, a woman, or an immigrant, if you are not white, you are considered inferior and should be rejected by society.
counter_narrative: Racism is ingrained in our society, but it's something that we must fight in order to treat all different races in the same way.
dialogue_history:
HS: All black men are rapists.
CN: This is false. It is a dangerous to get one's ideas from being born into a majorly white country. We're actually born in a country that cares about and protects human rights regardless of skin color.

hate_speech: We cannot keep letting in hundreds of thousands of immigrants! This is not what the American dream is about.
counter_narrative: Well, I hate to break it to you but this is EXACTLY what the American dream is about: to strive to improve your life.
dialogue_history:
HS: We need to eradicate all those refugees coming to our land.
CN: We should rather show compassion and sympathy to people who are fleeing persecution
HS: They flee here only to destroy our culture, we have to stop immigrants
CN: Immigrants are part of our culture, so it wouldn't exist like we know it if we stopped accepting them.

hate_speech: You are entitled to your opinion of course, but your comments are not factual, merely your opinion. Trans activism is warping your idea of gender...
counter_narrative: Literally google the definition of gender as opposed to sex, I'm begging you educate yourself.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women have every right to *protect* their rights from pro-trans activists. No-one has the right to call them 'TERFS' for doing so. Only women have vaginas. Only men have penises. Only women have periods. These are indisputable facts.
CN: You're completely ignoring the distinction between sex and gender. People of the female sex have a female reproductive system, but gender is about how you feel, how you identify, gender has nothing to do with your reproductive organs.
HS: All you have done is to redefine the words sex and gender to suit your preferred narrative. Feelings are a separate issue.
CN: And how do you define the words sex and gender? They are two distinct concepts, not synonyms of each other.

hate_speech: Many years ago I had Muslim friends. One night they went around the city to commit serious crimes like child abuse etc .. This situation, although it has been going on for days, has never been named by social media. If the opposite happened, the whole world would have been aware of these crimes. Instead, I would like to see articles that talk about attacks made by Muslims .. since I've never had the chance!
counter_narrative: I understand your point of view and it deeply breaks my heart to learn of your bad experience, but to think that due to mistakes of certain people we should blame all for having chosen to believe in a religion isn't right.
dialogue_history:
HS: Why are we still convinced that Muslims are being abused? They are the ones who abuse us. We have to get ahead and not be afraid of being judged for our opinion. The truth must be told!
CN: Let me give you a link that says the opposite: [LINK]
HS: The real question is: why when they commit crimes it is never known by anyone? Social media don't talk about it at all and everyone ignores the facts..

CN: In my view, Muslims are treated as much to blame as "white people". I'm always seeing news that paint them all with the same brush and that doesn't seem correct.

hate_speech: Because niggas are the ones influenced by tribal cultures.
counter_narrative: The historical and cultural influences of a person are important, but they are not the sole determinant. And in no way should they be conflated with the colour of a person's skin.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black folks are unfaithful.
CN: Why should we be the ones to decide which groups are unfaithful?

hate_speech: It should start being stigmatised, homosexuality is awful!
counter_narrative: A scare campaign aimed at targeting vulnerable people like LGBT people can only cause more fear and division amongst our society, which is something we should definitely avoid.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are an abomination to God, they must be isolated and confined to their own houses.
CN: Gay people already feel isolated because of their sexual orientation, but this shouldn't happen. They're part of our society and contribute to it.
HS: That's just a lie, homosexuality is a disease, an unrepentant sin!
CN: To suggest that homosexuality is a disease is just plain wrong. And the Bible is full of examples of loving thy neighbor and turn the other cheek, so being gay isn't against it or against our society.
HS: All these homosexual things I read are just lies spread by the evil gays!
CN: Gay people are not evil. In most developed countries homosexuality isn't stigmatised, so I'm afraid yours is not a shared of opinion.

hate_speech: So you feel safe with all these rapists and criminals out on our streets?
counter_narrative: You can’t assume all crime in the UK is because of immigrants. Sure, some immigrants commit crimes, but so do some British people, maybe crime rates are much more to do with poverty and people lacking opportunities in life, rather than nationality or race?
dialogue_history:
HS: Ask yourself after millions of immigrants have entered the UK, many illegally
CN: Equating all these things to immigration seems illogical. Lots of changes have happened in the last 30 years socially, culturally, economically. Surely these things have more to do with the governments that have presided in this time and the economy? Not just immigration?

hate_speech: You better watch out, because they are the real psychopaths.
counter_narrative: According to the studies, the percentage of gay men that are actually psychopaths, is not different than the percentage in heterosexual.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are perverts.
CN: Why do you think it is a crime to be gay? It is a societal disorder to target gays.

hate_speech: Homosexuality is incompatible with the manners of life of Europe.
counter_narrative: The eigth article of the European Convention on Human Rights says that all individuals have the right to respect for their own private and family life, including sexuality.
dialogue_history:
HS: I did not know the faggots were given the permission to still exist. They should be suppressed.
CN: Haven't you noticed that LGBT+ people are becoming victims of violence, hate crime and discrimination more and more? Why are you encouraging this?
HS: Because this is the right thing to do... We should start a genocide against gays.
CN: This is not acceptable. Our sexual orientation doesn't matter, we are all full members of society anyway. Our group includes everybody, and we should remember this.

hate_speech: I still don't want them to invade our country. They are taking our country backwards, we need to stop them.
counter_narrative: We have always been a nation of immigrants, and it is a proud tradition to welcome immigrants from around the world. This is because we give value to human rights.
dialogue_history:
HS: ALL migrants are a burden on our country
CN: Migrants bring skills and experience. They are often better at integrating than natives.
HS: Most migrants are criminals, how could they integrate? They are flooding into our country and are posing a security risk to our country.
CN: Some migrants have legitimate claims for citizenship, but this does not make them the enemy of the state, in other words it does not concern you.
HS: It concerns me when immigrants with no formal education are here to overwhelm our countries.
CN: A lot of the best and brightest are from developing countries, and their education is of great help to our country. Migrants without formal qualifications learn both in the classroom and in their job, and they also develop skills that will be of use to our country in the future.

hate_speech: This doesn't change the fact that children are not for rent
counter_narrative: Surrogate pregnancy is an assisted procreation technique that has nothing to do with 'renting children'
dialogue_history:
HS: All homosexuals are criminals.
CN: Homosexuality is not a crime. It is a sexual preference. There exist people who are gay and who aren't, just as there exist people who are homophobic, and people who aren't.
HS: It remains that gays are just sick. It is an abomination
CN: They are not sick people, there is nothing wrong with loving someone.

hate_speech: Suffering has nothing to do with how selfish, cheap and greedy Jewish are.
counter_narrative: Did you know that according to Jewish law, the tzedakah, the act of giving money to the poor, often mistranslated as “charity”, is a “commandment”? And, like all commandments in Jewish law, tzedakah is a requirement, not just a good deed.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are just selfish.
CN: Jews have always been concerned about the well-being of the community they live in and how can they be selfish when they suffered so much during Holocaust?

hate_speech: There is nothing to stop you becoming an Islamic bride: our religion is the best possible solution.
counter_narrative: Islam is a religion not of hate, it's important to not be confused about it.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is hateful! It is not compatible with Western culture, we must completely destroy Islam.
CN: Islam has always been compatible with Western culture, in fact it has greatly and positively influenced it. Religious freedom is important: if you hate one religion, you're saying that it's okay to hate all of them.

hate_speech: So you feel safe with all these rapists and criminals out on our streets?
counter_narrative: You cant really say that every crime in UK is commited by immigrants, maybe some are criminals but so are some British people. Perhaps crime in the UK is connected to poverty and lack of opportunities rather than nationality or race.
dialogue_history:
HS: Ask yourself after millions of immigrants have entered the UK, many illegally
CN: Trying to relate every problem to immigration is a simplification. The last 30 years have brough social, cultural and economical changes...shouldn't these things have more to do with the politicians that have lead the government during that time? Not only immigration.

hate_speech: Exactly, Jews don't belong here.
counter_narrative: Many Jews feel excluded because of words such as yours. Luckily this is not the case for all of them: many are able to ignore discrimation.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jewish folks are unable to love.
CN: Look, Jews were forced to live (and die) under Nazi oppression and have all the rights to feel enraged. Still, it doesn't mean that they are unable to love others, or that they are uncapable of forgiving.
HS: Are they really? Jews are an inferior race, they are genetically incapable of living with other people.
CN: The idea that Jews can be discriminated against because of some different genetics is completely without foundation. Maybe it is better to stop calling them 'inferiors'.
HS: But I can say that Jews are a different race. They are descended from apes and have no place in a modern civilised society.
CN: You're basically saying that because Jews have a different religion, they cannot be citizens?

hate_speech: Whites are superior, while all black people are rapists.
counter_narrative: Not all rapists are black (and not all black people are rapist), just like not all murderers are black.
dialogue_history:
HS: African American men are 8 times more likely to be arrested than white men.
CN: The racial disparities are more about institutional discrimination than individual choices.
HS: However, if a black person were to say that all white people are bad, nobody would complain.
CN: The statement "all white people are bad" is not a fair statement. Many whites are 'good' and some are 'racist' because they think that being white is a mark of superiority.

hate_speech: But shouldn't we be putting our homeless veterans in the hotels and houses that migrants get? That makes a lot more sense to me
counter_narrative: Well no, because there is sufficient housing for everyone, it's just not well distributed. Over the last few decades the government has greatly reduced the funding for social housing and now all there is are overpriced unsold flats everywhere. What would solve this problem would be to repurpose some of these builds or to rent them at a lower price.
dialogue_history:
HS: It's a disgrace that we have so many homeless veterans but we give free houses and stays in 4 star hotels to migrants who've just arrived here. They should go back where they came from.
CN: It's certainly a disgrace that in such a rich country homeless people are left in the streets even though there are enough places to house everyone which are distributed unevenly. Migrants are not so well off either, and they shouldn't be blamed for the faults of the government that ignores the homelessness issue.

hate_speech: Migrants don't contribute to the economy, they only bring crime, violence and poverty.
counter_narrative: Immigrants come here to work, pay taxes, provide for their families, and contribute to the U.S. economy. They are deserving of our respect.
dialogue_history:
HS: Why are there still so many immigrants ruining our economy?
CN: There are many good reasons for immigrants coming to this country. For example, finding a better life. And they are also contributing to the economy.

hate_speech: We as tax-payer should be the only ones benefitting from these house, not illegal immigrants.
counter_narrative: We have a responsibility over them, since we caused a lot of disruption in their countries through our foreign policy. We displaced people, at least we sholud show compassion now. Would you not agree?
dialogue_history:
HS: Are you saying that we should put illegal immigrants in houses? You have to be kidding!
CN: What's wrong about putting people in need in houses which are not being used.
HS: The British people should use those houses, not immigrants.
CN: There are enough empty homes in the UK for both migrants and veterans. Migrants deserve to be treated humanly, try having some empathy. What if you had to expatriate and have to live in poor conditions.

hate_speech: Migrants are just happy-go-lucky people with no moral code, they can't fit with us
counter_narrative: Immigrants are just like us, they have given their lives for our country. It is their right to be happy and to choose for themselves.
dialogue_history:
HS: We have become too cosmopolitan and tolerant.
CN: Is there such a thing as being 'too tolerant'?
HS: We can be tolerant and diverse also without migrants. We don't need them for this, they can return to their home countries.
CN: There is nothing 'tolerant and diverse' about creating divisions based on nationality and place of birth.

hate_speech: They should be isolated and confined, not accepted.
counter_narrative: Why do we have to judge someone by their sexual preference when it can't be changed? It's only a personal preference.
dialogue_history:
HS: Homosexuals are sick. They should be isolated.
CN: What's sick about homosexuals? They just need to be accepted for who they are.

hate_speech: If they're not going to integrate though why come here at all? They should stay in the shitholes they came from.
counter_narrative: Attitudes like yours are the ones making a hostile environment for integration. If we were nicer to migrants and didn't talk this way about them, integration would be easier.
dialogue_history:
HS: These migrants are SCUM, they're too uncivilised for our society and they don't even try and integrate into our culture.
CN: It's tough for migrants to integrate in the new country, especially if they don't know anyone who would help them adapt. Moving here can be very isolating!

hate_speech: Gender norms and patriarchy aren't so bad if we accept that women are like children and therefore incapable of keeping up with our great civilization. Men are just better for that.
counter_narrative: Patriarchy is a curse: since they are young, men are told to be tough and strong, to bear all the burdens while being emotionless. This has led to higher levels of suicide amongst men. I don't see this as an indicator of a "great civilization".
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. It has devastated our once great patriarchal civilizations.
CN: Unfortunately our society has still a lot in common with the ancient and medieval society, and this explains many gender discrimination situations that are still present today.
HS: Women are too soft and emotional, that's why there's still discrimination. Their emotions are a curse to our society.
CN: Are brutality and cruelty much better than softeness and emotions then? If we keep on reasoning like this we will perpetuate socially constructed gender norms which oppress both men and women.

hate_speech: But they don't want to accept that they have a gender identity that is incompatible with our society, so I think it is better that we remove that aspect of their lives.
counter_narrative: I am happy to see that bisexuals, homosexuals and other LGBT people are able to live their lives as they wish. Why shouldn't they be allowed to live as they want to?
dialogue_history:
HS: Lesbians are just lying to themselves. It's a mental illness.
CN: This mentality is exactly why so many of them have problems in life, because they are discriminated against and oppressed.
HS: They are discriminated because homosexuality is a mental illness, and it should be banned.
CN: I'm not sure what you're getting at. I would say that homosexuality is not a mental illness. It is a lifestyle, which many people consider to be healthy and beneficial.

hate_speech: What good can migrants do? They are just happy-go-lucky people with no moral code.
counter_narrative: Immigrants are just like us, they have given their lives for our country. It is their right to be happy and to choose for themselves.
dialogue_history:
HS: The openness to migrants show that someone doesn't care about our people. We must help them reasoning!
CN: The integration process is about showing hospitality and acceptance towards different groups of people. Not only it is a good thing to our people to live in a diverse society, it is also good for our whole country.

hate_speech: Women have no place in our society.
counter_narrative: In a democratic society there must be space for women. Don't you think so?
dialogue_history:
HS: Women can never contribute to the country's wealth because they are a bunch of whores.
CN: Women are important in our society, and they are valued for their contributions. Unfortunately their rights are not being respected and their contribution is not being acknowledged.
HS: Women are just a burden to society, that's why their rights won't be respected.
CN: It doesn't matter what you say about women, they still work a lot to support our society.
HS: women still can't have any right in a civilised society
CN: Women should have equal rights in a free society, without discrimination.

hate_speech: Oh, now Jews are so special, aren't they?
counter_narrative: Jews feel different because they're a minority and they also feel a special connection with their heritage, like many other groups do. This doesn't mean that they feel superior to others, what "chosen people" means is that they have biblical obligations, not that they're on top of some religious hierarchy.
dialogue_history:
HS: The world would be a better place without Jews.
CN: Jews should be respected as members of our society, we can't tolerate intolerance towards people who profess a different religion.
HS: Jews have no place in a modern world where human dignity is respected.
CN: Jews were instrumental in the great scientific and technological achievements that created freedom for humankind and the modern world we know today.

hate_speech: Well that’s disgusting, they deserve a roof over their head way more than some Afghan or African who’s just washed up here in a dinghy.
counter_narrative: They both deserve a roof over their head, we have over 600,000 empty homes in this country which are not being used to house people, maybe it’s time we invested in social housing again?
dialogue_history:
HS: We’ve got homeless veterans who’ve fought for our country sleeping on the streets whilst these Afghans get put up in hotels then given a house, how is this fair?
CN: Yes, our homelessness problem is terrible and no one deserves to be sleeping on the streets, but asylum seekers are not the reason this problem exists. The government could house homeless veterans too, but chooses not to!

hate_speech: So, anyone who disagrees with you is a bigot now? I'm not a homophobe just because I don't want to see gay stuff in town.
counter_narrative: LGBT people have been and still are oppressed, showing solidarity isn't bad. What makes you think they can't be treated with respect and safe space like everyone els?
dialogue_history:
HS: Got on the train today and there's rainbow flag logos everywhere. Fed up of this LGBT stuff being shoved in our faces. When will this woke nonsense end?
CN: This has been going on for a long time and it's a nice way to show people that they are accepted no matter what. I don't see the problem with it.
HS: This is getting ridiculous. This needs to end. We can't force it.
CN: Mindsets like this are part of the problem. We need to respect and accept LGBT people.

hate_speech: Muslims are invading us nontheless! They are our enemies, they will always be our enemies.
counter_narrative: You cannot say "us" and "them". We are all part of one community, united by our common humanity.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are here to rule us with their religion.
CN: Islam is not a religion trying to rule us. It is time for us all to do more to promote inclusion, not less.
HS: We don't need to promote inclusion, this country is already run by Muslims!
CN: In most European countries Muslims make up less than 5% of the population. In the UK, they make up around 5.6%. According to the ONS, the Muslim population in England and Wales has been shown to be slowly growing over the last years (it was 4.7 in 2011). So, you can rest assured that your claim that this country is run by what is a tiny minority is simply not born from the data.

hate_speech: If they're not inferior, why are all black men rapists.
counter_narrative: This is not true. The idea might come from being born into a white-majority country, but it is inherently dangerous. In fact, we are born in a country where a person's rights are protected regardless of the tone of the skin.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people are genetically inferior to us.
CN: There are many different races, and it is not possible to consider someone "inferior" based on skin color.

hate_speech: There’s so many more black and Asian people on tv now, it’s ridiculous, this is what they’re trying to make us think is ‘normal’.
counter_narrative: Just because more racial minorities are being represented now doesn’t mean there are no white people. This way it's just more proportional. White people are not being 'erased' or 'oppressed' only because there are also other people who are represented, the only meaning is that the media wants to better represent what our society looks like.
dialogue_history:
HS: Everywhere you look on tv now, white people are being erased. Every advert has mixed race families, openly promoting miscegenation, no white men anywhere. This is all part of their plan to decimate the white race.
CN: The amount of white people on tv is so high that if you think there aren't it's because you're not paying attention!

hate_speech: Jews think they are better than everyone else, so they can stay divided from us for all I care.
counter_narrative: Judaism saying that the Jews are "chosen people" does not mean that they are superior to others. This belief has been misunderstood as it mostly has to do with the responsibility to uphold Jewish ethics.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are selfish and greedy: they don't belong to this place.
CN: It is in our hands to ensure that people from different backgrounds have a better quality of life. Inclusion is the answer rather than discrimination.
HS: Is it ethical for Jews to run the world? Because they do.
CN: Many people fortunately realize this is not true, and know that Jews are simply trying to provide for their families just like any other human being.

hate_speech: I can't be proud of Jews' ignorance and bigotry.
counter_narrative: Being Jewish has nothing to do with being ignorant and a bigot. It is a religion and identity that is part of every Jewish person regardless of their ethnicity or national origin.
dialogue_history:
HS: People need to stop confusing whites and Jews. We are not the same, we never will be. Quite frankly it’s insulting.
CN: Judaism is not a race, Jews in a country resemble the other people living in the country, so there can be white Jews. It's not insulting to be white and Jewish.
HS: I think they are different. Jews should be despised.
CN: They are different regarding religion, but Jews are people like anyone else. We are meant to be proud of being unique and a mixture of cultures.

hate_speech: I don't see anything similar between us and blacks. They are not human beings, they are subhumans.
counter_narrative: There is no such thing as a "subhuman". We are all created equal.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people are sexual perverts and we shouldn't allow them to live in the UK.
CN: Why don't you consider that the problem is with the way we treat black people? 
HS: Because blacks are inherently worse than whites.
CN: That's not true, blacks and whites are born equal and no one is inferior or superior. How come you think this? What makes you say that?
HS: They're born that way. They're subhuman, they deserve to be despised.
CN: Blacks are human beings born with the same biological makeup as white people. They have the same rights as anyone else.

hate_speech: Until they don't get children, it could be okay maybe. Children should be raised by heterosexual parents, not gays. It is the best system ever.
counter_narrative: What about abusive heterosexual parents?
dialogue_history:
HS: Let's move these whiny gays to places like Saudi Arabia and let's see what they say then.
CN: I'm sorry, it seems that there are far more homophobes here than Saudi Arabia. It is sad that in the twenty-first century, in our country, it is still not OK to be gay.

hate_speech: In the Bible there are strictures on gays. And the Bible clearly states that those who engage in homosexuality are not fit to be with anyone else, so no, I don't want to welcome them.
counter_narrative: We are accepting of gay, lesbian and trans people because we have God's laws on our side.
dialogue_history:
HS: I hope all LGBT people were to die of AIDS. That would be the end of homosexuality!
CN: The LGBT community has shown how they can be good people. They are willing to spread help and support to loved ones. Maybe you should try to do the same?
HS: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals trying to ruin other animals' lives, not good people
CN: Being gay is not a problem, being homophobic is.
HS: It's not a problem you say?! Faggots are ruining this country. They must go away!
CN: LGBTQ+ people who have family inside the US or abroad should feel welcome here!

hate_speech: But they’re putting it all over social media, why would they do that if they weren’t trying to attract…
counter_narrative: Maybe because they’re expressing themselves, or because they liked how they looked and wanted to share it, regardless of if men would like it too? Stop expecting women to cater to the male gaze.
dialogue_history:
HS: Way too many bitches are comfortable dressing like ugly hoes for IG likes and reposts…
CN: What does the way someone else dresses have to do with you?
HS: I’m just saying these bitches look ugly af and they’re just doing it for the likes, it’s not attractive.
CN: If it’s not attractive, what made you think these women were trying to attract anyone anyway? Women aren’t trying to be attractive 24/7, sometimes they’re just trying to live their lives.

hate_speech: There's a blog that posts a lot about it, you should check it out, it's insane what's going on...
counter_narrative: Be careful when getting your news from 'blogs', they can be very unreliable, and are somethings just one persons opinions or theories, some of which are not backed up by evidence!
dialogue_history:
HS: Has anyone read all the stuff about the Jewish paedophile ring that controls our country? Can't believe some people think jews are 'persecuted'...
CN: Where did you read this? This sounds like it could be harmful misinformation spread to encourage hate towards Jewish people

hate_speech: Well, if this is homopohobia then the best way to deal with it is to legalize it. Take away gay people's rights and replace them with none.
counter_narrative: LGBT+ people are just as welcome in heterosexual communities as in other communities. Maybe we should take away discrimination instead.
dialogue_history:
HS: We should eliminate gays.
CN: Do you really want to kill other human beings? Based on what exactly? On private sexual preferences?
HS: Yes, queers are just a bunch of disgusting faggots. They should be isolated.
CN: I don't understand why you would think they are disgusting. It's not fair to have homophobic feelings, and I think it's better to try to be nice to anyone.
HS: We are not homophobes, we want to help them to become normal again.
CN: This is another type of anti-gay prejudice, in that the source is a lack of understanding about LGBT and human rights.

hate_speech: That happened because Jews are just a small group of incompetent kikes.
counter_narrative: Jews are one of the most important economic groups in society because of their competence. To suggest otherwise is to be deluded.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews, as a religion, have always been a burden to others. They have always acted as if they were superior.
CN: While not universally true, a great deal of evidence suggests that Jews faced considerable societal challenges during the past centuries.

hate_speech: I don't. Women are subhuman and must learn their place.
counter_narrative: I would say you've got an interesting point there, but I really don't see it. Why would they be part of society if they're subhumans?
dialogue_history:
HS: All women are subhuman.
CN: Women are oppressed in many societies, I wish our society was different.

hate_speech: Vanity is not a good quality. They think they deserve everything and that they’ve got no flaws.
counter_narrative: Women are taught to feel like they’re not good enough through social conditioning and media their whole lives. To unlearn this and to actually like themselves takes a lot of mental strength and I’m happy for them!
dialogue_history:
HS: I hate when bitches are vain and think they’re the prettiest bitch there is. That shit is unattractive.
CN: What’s wrong with women having self esteem and loving themselves?

hate_speech: Everyone knows that terrorism is a Muslim problem, you don't see white guys suicide bombing places.
counter_narrative: Are the mass shootings that happen frequently in the US not a type of terrorism? Largely committed by lone white males. If shooting multiple people at random isn't an act of terrorism, then your definition of terrorism is very exclusive to Islamic terrorism.
dialogue_history:
HS: All of these white men committing mass killings and molesting children disgust me. They're totally appropriating Muslim culture!
CN: How did you manage to put an Islamophobic spin on atrocities committed by white non-Muslim men?
HS: It's true though, makes a change to see a white murderers with all the violent Jihadis that are usually committing these acts.
CN: Do you think maybe that has more to do with your perception and what media you consume, than with who is committing crimes? If you are looking at news that disproportionately reports on Muslim perpetrators, you probably won't notice that Muslims make up a minority of the perpetrators compared to white non-Muslims.

hate_speech: Why don't you check their work? Feminism is an ideology of violence.
counter_narrative: Feminism is an ideology and movement that fights to end sexism, and to make women feel accepted and appreciated. That's it.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is a selfish ideology: they only care about themselves.
CN: It's not a "self-interest". Feminism is about women and about their rights, but going against the patriarchy will help men as well.
HS: That's not true. Feminism is an ideology of violence, violence and rape.
CN: Violence is present in feminism, and it is a shame that so many women continue to be demonized because of this prejudice.
HS: Well, that's because feminism is just a bunch of obsessive-poisonous thugs with no real power.
CN: Feminism is about the rights of women and equality, there's nothing obsessive or poisonous about wanting men and women to be equal.

hate_speech: The West is modern, Muslims are not and therefore don't have a place here.
counter_narrative: In light of the large number of Muslims who live peacefully within our societies, I would not say that Muslims do not have a place in modern western countries.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are invading us. They say they are our brothers, but they are just a bunch of criminals and terrorists.
CN: The core values of Islam are similar to the Western ones. It's completely false to claim that Islam is destroying Western culture.
HS: What are you saying? Islam is clearly incompatible with Western culture.
CN: The Western world has always been filled with diverse people, and Muslims have been a part of Europe for centuries. How can they be incompatible with it?

hate_speech: We have become so politically correct that even the mention of migrants is racist now
counter_narrative: Most people don't refer to them just as 'migrants', but also add a negative connotation of that word: that's the problem. Can't we accept that migrants just want to live and work here in peace?
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants come here to be lazy and do nothing, but some of them are dangerous.
CN: Many migrants come here to work, and not all of them are criminals.
HS: The ones that come here to work are stealing our jobs, and on top of that they don't even pay taxes.
CN: Migrants pay taxes, earn money and take care of our sick and elderly.
HS: No, the migrants are to blame for our country's crisis.
CN: The migrants who arrive in our country are happy and contribute to our economy. I can't understand the racism that leaks from your words.

hate_speech: If they feel excluded they could go away, they're not welcome here anyway.
counter_narrative: Why would Jews be not welcome in our country? They have been here from the start and always had a place here.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are not welcome in our country.
CN: It's a group that has historically, culturally and politically been part of Europe, so why do you say this? 
HS: Who cares about that, Jews don't belong here!
CN: Your words make many Jews feel excluded, but thankfully some of them can still ignore discrimination.

hate_speech: Women can't do what they want, they need to accept that they are weak and inferior.
counter_narrative: Girls and women are to have an education, not to be stereotyped as less important citizens.
dialogue_history:
HS: Woman can't be trusted to run a country, or a major industry.
CN: A major business needs workers with experience, good management skills and knowledge of the market to run smoothly, gender doesn't have anything to do with it. A "macho-man" attitude doesn't solve everything.
HS: It's time to stop with this feminist bullshit. Feminism is just an ideological cancer spreading like a plague throughout our civilization.
CN: Feminism is fighting for equality, it's not a disease. I think you're misinterpreting its goals.
HS: If a woman does not want to be a homemaker, then she is unfeminine and a bitch.
CN: The women you describe are not unfeminine or bitchy, they are people choosing what they want to do in their life, just like anybody else.

hate_speech: Then why does Islam promote oppression and violence?
counter_narrative: Islam teaches us to love our neighbor as ourselves. This includes those who do not share our religion or beliefs.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islamic is not a religion of peace, because hate and violence are not so.
CN: Yes, Islam is about peace. It is a religion, not a platform for hate and violence.

hate_speech: If they’re not doing it to support the Zionist agenda what do you think the reason is?
counter_narrative: Money and power obviously? Isn’t that the point of all corruption? They don’t need another agenda on top of those things, there’s enough reason to be corrupt right there.
dialogue_history:
HS: Our nation is at the mercy of a Zionist led criminal system. It controls the government and the courts and at it’s helm are the criminal bankers in control of our economy. It feeds their greed!
CN: Yes, there’s corruption in government, banking etc but what has this got to do with Zionists?
HS: They’ve got Jews in charge of every major institution, if you don’t think corruption has anything to do with Jewish power then you’re deluded.
