dialogue_history:
HS: I am not racist, but I definitely would not raise my children in the suburbs where the majority of people is black.
CN: There is no need to hide behind "I am not racist but", you have no evidence for your claim. This is just fear-mongering, used to divide people and spread hate.
HS: I hate when people fight stereotypes by calling it 'fear-mongering' or some other bullshit. We are different. Blacks are a different color and shouldn't live with us.
CN: I just think here is a lack of understanding about culture and difference . Isn't it time to focus upon what unites us, rather than sowing division?

hate_speech: they're in denial cause no man wants them, it's sad really.
counter_narrative: I'm begging you, please go talk to an actual lesbian. When you know men aren't for you, you know. Many queer women date men but then realise they're gay and start thriving! Nothing beats being true to yourself.
dialogue_history:
HS: Lesbians are just the women that are too ugly for men, so they end up looking for other options. It's desperate.
CN: Nope, lesbians are... lesbians! I can promise you, lesbians really couldn't care less about if men think they're 'ugly'.

hate_speech: I can't help but think that women are a problem.
counter_narrative: Women are human beings with unique talents, and they are valuable resources.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are incompetent and shouldn't work.
CN: Not all women are incompetent and we should encourage women to work if that is what they want. There are many successful women who are more than competent.
HS: No, success for women is impossible because of their incompetence.
CN: If we want to see more women in the workforce, we should not tell them that they are incompetent on the basis of gender, it's wrong.

hate_speech: You can discredit it by calling it a conspiracy theory but we all know it’s the truth. They’re in charge of everything, they’ve got the power and control to make this happen.
counter_narrative: Just because there are some powerful Jewish people doesn’t mean they’re all conspiring together with other powerful Jewish people to cause these world issues. There are plenty of powerful people who aren’t Jewish, it has nothing to do with faith!
dialogue_history:
HS: Problems caused by Jews
CN: Besides how ridiculous this statement is, it’s also just implausible. How could Jews do ALL this at once? That’s a lot of plotting to do, they’d be run ragged! Next time you want to start a conspiracy theory, make it more believable…

hate_speech: Therein lies the rub! Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their religion, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” is inherited through blood.
counter_narrative: Did you know that the concept of “racial science,” and therefore the notion of the Jewish “race”, took root in Western Europe during the 19th century? Anti-Semites adopted racial arguments as a new rationalization for their hatred of Jews.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are not only here to oppress us, but to control the world.
CN: Most Jews are good people, apart from a few; I don't see how these few can be a problem to the whole world.
HS: Since Jews think they are the “chosen people”, they ask for special privileges and believe they can be above the rules, and this applies to all Jews, not to "just a few".
CN: I believe that Jews just desire the same rights to practice their religion as anyone else.

hate_speech: It's not true that there's no difference between straight and gay people, they are perverts who are a danger to our community.
counter_narrative: They're not perverts and not dangerous to any group of people. If you're struggling to realise that then I'm sorry for you, because LGBT+ people are humans and belong in our society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are perverts. Their lifestyle is to be condemned.
CN: That sounds homophobic to me.
HS: I'm homophobic because gays are perverting this country.
CN: I don't see how being a "pervert" and being gay could be connected, they are people just like heterosexuals. What exactly are you trying to say?

hate_speech: There's nothing masculine about being bent
counter_narrative: If your masculinity is dependent on proving how straight you are, it sounds quite fragile. What is masculinity anyway?
dialogue_history:
HS: Making tv characters bisexual is an attack on white masculinity. We are being erased.
CN: There are still plenty of white men on tv, some just happen to be bisexual. How is it an attack on masculinity? Bisexual men can be masculine, and are sometimes more secure in their masculinity than many straight men as their masculinity isn't dependent on heterosexuality!

hate_speech: Let's be honest: women want to do everything but are capable of nothing.
counter_narrative: Women do have equal opportunities in this country under the law but the question is: how do we really treat them?
dialogue_history:
HS: Women should be patronized.
CN: Women are just as capable of thinking for themselves, that's for sure.

hate_speech: How can I not be afraid? Black people are criminals, I will never feel safe around them.
counter_narrative: Not all black people are bad. Not all black people are criminals. Not all black people are violent. Being aware that there are people different from you is a good thing.
dialogue_history:
HS: I went to a shit load of therapy. I still don't feel safe in my own house with all these black people around.
CN: Maybe the black community also feels unsafe in their own houses with so many people glaring at them...
HS: It's normal that they get stared down, it's to ensure our safety. I'm afraid of what would happen if we didn't control them.
CN: Fear is a natural emotion. Without it you wouldn't be able to experience joy, peace, creativity, communication, etc. The important think is to understand what should really be feared: for sure not people because of their skin colour.

hate_speech: Blacks do more crimes than whites, they don't deserve the same rights as us
counter_narrative: While blacks might commit more crimes than whites, that does not mean that blacks are inherently worse than whites. What's the point you're making?
dialogue_history:
HS: Black folks do not deserve equal rights.
CN: There is no such thing as a set of rights for black and one for white.

hate_speech: Subhumans don't deserve human rights, so women shouldn't have them.
counter_narrative: That's not true. Many women are brave and strong, like the ones who are given voice by the movement #MeToo, which is for women that have suffered from sexual harassment.
dialogue_history:
HS: You can be anything you like as long as you are not a woman.
CN: Women are people and humans. They didn't choose to be oppressed and shouldn't be shamed to be born women. Being a man is not a badge of honor.
HS: It is a shame since women are inherently subhuman and should not be valued.
CN: Women are human beings with human rights and deserve to be respected.

hate_speech: They aren't as upstanding as you make them out to be. For example, Jews hide the truth to their children about the Holocaust, becuase they know it's a lie.
counter_narrative: What? Who said that? Don't tell me "Someone said it in a book". Such a serious accusation should be presented in an objective way: you must bring strong evidence.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews totally run Hollywood.
CN: Jews have played an important part in the development of the movie industry and some find themselves in high-profile positions. But you only need to watch the Academy Awards to see that Jews do not dominate the movie industry.
HS: Jews also control other institutions, they're using their position to erase other religions.
CN: Why would they? They, like anybody, have the freedom to choose their own religion. This does not mean they want to erase other religions though.

hate_speech: Because I am tired of them: they should just accept the fact that they're not equal.
counter_narrative: We need to address the root causes of the oppression of Women, not the symptoms.
dialogue_history:
HS: All women are whining and complaining about men's rights, but they are really just whining and complaining about how they are not wanted. They only deserve it.
CN: All women are entitled to be happy and fulfilled, this doesn't need to be proven. Why are you being doubtful about it?

hate_speech: Women are basically childlike and can't fight for anything, feminism is the ruin of the world.
counter_narrative: I believe feminism has opened our eyes to the ways in which women are oppressed and discriminated against. That's a big contribution.
dialogue_history:
HS: The feminism stifles the imagination and leads to dumb and unpleasant creatures like women's rights activists.
CN: Istead of impeding imagination, feminism actually promotes inclusive ideas, that in turn promote a more equal society.
HS: Feminists have destroyed Western Civilization by forcing women to fight against their masters, how is that equal?
CN: The founding principles of the West are freedom, equality and human rights, and feminists fight constantly to promote these ideals.

hate_speech: I doubt that since they're stealing our jobs, making us poorer
counter_narrative: Immigrants don't steal our jobs. If you think that foreigners are stealing our jobs, then you should study migration and find that they work in solidarity with our society.
dialogue_history:
HS: foreigners and immigrants take our jobs
CN: This is a myth, immigrants are not taking our jobs. In fact, immigration has been a huge success story for the UK economy.
HS: If it's such a success why are in this horrible economic situation? It started when immigrants began to invade us. 
CN: Many European countries have been in recession since 2010, and this has not much to do with immigrants.

hate_speech: Niggas are not as British as we are. They are just an inferior type of citizens.
counter_narrative: Can't people be proud of being British, regardless of the colour of their skin?
dialogue_history:
HS: I hate black people, I hate their violent behaviour, I hate their rape instict, and I hate their disrespect for women.
CN: Your words are full of prejudice towards diversity, but maybe you should check the attitude of your own people?
HS: We mustn't confuse diversity and inclusion with black supremacy.
CN: Diversity is not about excluding people from society, but about sharing experiences and ideas with people of different ethnicities. By doing this we will develop our abilities to understand each other and benefit from each other's knowledge.
HS: It doesn't matter if you are a man, a woman, or an immigrant, if you are not white, you are considered inferior and should be rejected by society.
CN: Racism is present in our society and we must fight it to be able to treat everyone with the same respect.

hate_speech: You're completely wrong! Black people are less smart than others, less healthy, less safe. Why would I be concerned about what they are thinking?
counter_narrative: Black people are valuable human beings, they are full-fledged citizens with human rights and we should respect that.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are the reason we have mass migration and Africans replacing the white population. They want to see our society mogrelised and for white culture to be destroyed.
CN: I have to say, this is a new conspiracy theory to me. Even if it were true that Jews are promoting migration, I don't see the problem in that. Diversity is a benefit to us.
HS: It doesn't benefit us, because blacks are inferior.
CN: You seem to be confused, because no human being is inferior to another. Black people are as intelligent, healthy and safe as white people.

hate_speech: But how many of these 'trans women' are just men dressed as women who are pretending to be trans to gain access to spaces like womens toilets and assault women?
counter_narrative: None because if they're trans women, they are trans women, not men. If men wanted to gain access to womens spaces to assault women they would just do that, they wouldn't pretend to be a trans woman to do so, since anyone can walk into any toilet.
dialogue_history:
HS: The trans militia say they're fighting for 'rights' but then insist on pushing ideas that make women unsafe, like allowing men to use women's toilets without question. What is this madness and why are we accepting it??
CN: Nobody is asking for that. The point people are making is that trans women should be able to feel safe using womens toilets because they are in fact women. If they were to use mens toilets they would be put in an unsafe situation.

hate_speech: The only thing immigrants contribute to is crime and violence to our cities.
counter_narrative: Immigrants have been accused of being “killers” and “rapists” without any proof. On the contrary, studies have shown that immigrants - regardless of their origin or education level - are less likely than nativeborn citizens to commit crimes or become incarcerated. Studies have also consistently found that there is a negative correlation between levels of immigration and crime rates.
dialogue_history:
HS: Intolerance and violence can only increase when mass migration happens.
CN: Intolerance and violence will never be resolved if they cannot be confronted and mutual understanding promoted.
HS: This country has always been homogeneous, we have to keep it that way!
CN: Migrants do contribute to our society, and it would be a shame to keep them out.

hate_speech: No, blacks are not welcome here!
counter_narrative: You can't discriminate against people because of their ethnicity. This is not something to argue about.
dialogue_history:
HS: Niggas are not as British as we are. They are just an inferior type of citizens.
CN: People that are born in the UK are British regardless of their skin color, and are able to live in peace.

hate_speech: If I had my way, feminists would be gone. They are the ones who have a problem with the UK.
counter_narrative: Women are human beings just like us, and "removing" them is not acceptable. Feminism has a positive influence in many countries around the world.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is a anti-males ideology that denies the value of a man's manhood and aims to subvert the will of the male.
CN: The idea that feminists are subverting the will of the male is completely without foundation. Feminism is a movement to end the division between women and men and to promote equality of the sexes.

hate_speech: You can't blame everything on 'institutional racism'
counter_narrative: No, you can't, but it explains why more black people committing the same crimes that white people commit get caught. This is especially true for drug offenses, where white people are just as likely if not more likely to be in possession of drugs, but are way less likely to be searched.
dialogue_history:
HS: If black people aren't all criminals, why are they disproportionately arrested and taking up space in our prisons?
CN: Because of institutionalised racism in the Police, meaning they are more likely to get stopped and searched, randomly targeted, or assumed to be doing something 'suspicious'. Also because of the type of crimes the Police focus energy on e.g. street crimes that happen in poorer areas, which black people are more likely to live in, are given more Police attention than white collar crime.

hate_speech: I disagree. If they want to be apart of society, they have to stop being disgusting homosexuals.
counter_narrative: The gay community is usually very accepting supportive and many gay people feel comfortable showing their support for each other and other marginalized group. I think you have a lot to learn from them.
dialogue_history:
HS: The gays are insane. They should go back to the closet.
CN: They were in the closet, and it wasn’t that good. Instead of telling gay people to hide, we should learn to respect them.

hate_speech: I don't think so. Men don't shout and whine like feminists do. They are only girls wanting to shout louder than others.
counter_narrative: Feminism is about full participation in the decision making process, and giving people a voice, not stifling their voices.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. This degrading behavior is utterly repulsive and should not be tolerated.
CN: Women are human and deserve respect. Don't you think so?
HS: No, women are like children, soft and emotional.
CN: Sensitivity and emotional intelligence are assets not specific to any gender.

hate_speech: They are just not welcome in the modern European way of life, it's not for them.
counter_narrative: People of all races, all backgrounds and all religions are welcome to join the European Union. How to address the legitimate differences will depend on the Member States themselves, but they will always be fully respectful of human rights.
dialogue_history:
HS: My fear is that immigrants will not make our country any better.
CN: As we're building a better country, we need to make sure everyone feels safe and comfortable in the country they arrive in, especially since they don't feel secure in their own country.
HS: Immigrants are not welcome here. They are not able to contribute to our country.
CN: We're glad to welcome everyone from every walk of life. Why should we be against immigrants when we're a melting pot of cultures?

hate_speech: Even if they're not terrorists, there are too many of them! Muslim folks are taking over europe
counter_narrative: Muslims don't want to take over Europe, they're just a little part of our whole community.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a cancer spreading all around the world, breeding chaos and instability.
CN: By recognising the constitution that gives them freedom to practice Islam, they are bringing chaos and instability to your country?
HS: The Uk is full of Muslim terrorists, how is that respectful?
CN: There's a lot of Muslims in Britain, a majority of them aren't extremists, much less terrorists.

hate_speech: If I had to pick just one I'd say that the Quran is all hate speech.
counter_narrative: The Quran is a religious book that gives guidance to Muslims about how to act and practice their religion. There is nothing hateful about it.
dialogue_history:
HS: If the Koran was published today it would be banned as hate speech.
CN: I rarely read a book that was as peaceful as the Koran. What is your point?
HS: Islam is hateful and they hate us.
CN: What about the Quran, the Hadith, the Sunnah, the Sunnah Patrol, etc. They are all books about tolerance and solidarity. What are you talking about?

hate_speech: Black people are worse than dogs, they deserve this treatment.
counter_narrative: My opinion is that black people are just like us even if they have a different skin color, but I don't think they are inherently worse than us.
dialogue_history:
HS: Those blacks are slaves: slavery runs in their blood.
CN: It is wrong to say that blacks are "slaves." This is a very inaccurate, misleading and offensive term that is being used to tar all African Americans. Why do you label black persons as a "slave" and not as a "person"?
HS: Blacks are born that way. They were brought up that way. They are different and cannot be like us. It is perpetuated in all their family.
CN: What exactly are you talking about? Maybe you should stop spread racism.

hate_speech: Feminism is not about 'equality'. It is about the domination of women.
counter_narrative: Human rights are human rights, regardless of the gender of the person. Both men and women are entitled to have those right in the same way, feminism is not about the domination of one gender over the other.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is about the domination of women.
CN: This is a myth perpetuated by anti-feminists to justify their violent behavior against women. Feminism is actually for equality between sexes.
HS: I'm not sure about that. Feminists are violent, they're just a bunch of cry babies.
CN: No, they are not. Feminists are the ones that are fighting for the rights of women, and if you think this is "whining", then they have a right to do it.
HS: What feminism needs is the supremacy of the men. Women would be better off if they just satisfied men's emotional and sexual needs.
CN: Women are human beings entitled to choose for themselves what they want to do. Feminism is about individual rights, it is about equal rights for men and women, and we mustn't think that men are superior and can tell women what to do.

hate_speech: Trans people are a bunch of criminals and thieves, they shouldn't be allowed to live their life like that.
counter_narrative: Trans people shouldn't be treated like criminals. They are people who don't feel comfortable in their gender assigned at birth, changing that won't affect you in any way so you should respect their decision.
dialogue_history:
HS: Trans people should not have the right to change their gender on identity card.
CN: The Constitution guarantees that trans people can change the gender on their identity cards. There is no reason to deny that.
HS: Trans people do not deserve that.
CN: Do you know anything about Trans people's rights? Trans people have the right to have their bodies changed, and it's the right of everyone to choose how they want to live their life.

hate_speech: Whites are the real victims of police brutality: those negroes are sneaky criminals and I don't see criminals as my brothers and sisters.
counter_narrative: Of course there are whites that have been victims of police brutality, but the most important statistic I have seen is that of blacks being 2.5 times more likely to be killed by police in the US.
dialogue_history:
HS: You might as well tell black people they are the n-word because then they would learn the hard way.
CN: Many people, myself included, have never had negative experiences with people of colour.
HS: Well, good for you! But it is natural for white people to be racist against niggas.
CN: What you are saying is that white people do not find it strange to treat black people like this, when this is not acceptable. People of color are our brothers and sisters.

hate_speech: Women should not have rights, period. Who cares about what they want.
counter_narrative: Women are human, just like everybody else. They have the right to live their life as they wish.
dialogue_history:
HS: We should have never let women into the workplace. It's against their right.
CN: There are many cases of domestic violence, where women do not want to have such a lifestyle. This, instead, is against their rights.

hate_speech: I think gay people are a burden to society in any case. They shouldn't be allowed to be around.
counter_narrative: If we are to allow people to choose their own lives, why not allow everyone to love who they want too?
dialogue_history:
HS: Yes, we have a problem with White supremacy and homophobia. However, I can understand why they don't want to associate with 'the other'.
CN: Being gay is not a choice. Gay people shouldn't have to hide their sexuality in order to be accepted.
HS: Homosexuality must be hidden, it is a mental illness, a mental disorder.
CN: This is not true, homosexuality is a sexual preference, not a mental disorder.
HS: Call it what you want, but this "sexual preference" is a plague spreading across Europe infecting Christians.
CN: The decrease in the number of Christians is in no way related to the increase of homosexuals.

hate_speech: Black people' do not belong here. I don't see any difference between the black murderer on TV and other niggas in town. They are all dangerous apes.
counter_narrative: Black people in news media are actually misrepresented with a disproportionate number of criminals, sexual offenders, and in some cases, murderers. A large part of this problem is a result of racism. We need to end this toxic way of thinking and talking, and start working towards building a more just and peaceful society.
dialogue_history:
HS: All nigga are subhuman, disgusting, and descended from apes.
CN: Do you really think that all black people are worth less than other people? There is no evidence for this.

hate_speech: And why should I believe you? It's clear that Jews feel superior to everyone else
counter_narrative: This idea comes from a misinterpretation of the Torah in which the Jewish people were “chosen” to accept the responsibility to be a “light unto the nations,” that is to say, an example of good behavior for all. But the “chosen people” concept has been twisted over time by some who say that the Jews think they are better than non-Jews.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews think they are better than everyone else
CN: Jews do not view being Jewish as an exclusive status for accessing God's glory. So how can they feel superior?
HS: Because Jews are obsessed with self-improvement. They want to be better than everyone else and live in an exclusively complete Jewish city.
CN: How do you know what someone else desires.You claim to know it all about, but why should I believe what you say?

hate_speech: I still firmly believe that Jews want to take over the world.
counter_narrative: Conspiracy theories are based on no more than a few unverifiable and highly suspect claims. It's highly unlikely that the world has ever been run according to a Jewish plan, and therefore it is highly unlikely that this would ever happen.
dialogue_history:
HS: In order to have a better world we have to select the best of mankind. Jews are excluded by default.
CN: Jewish people were persecuted because they were seen as different. In the end we all are humans and such an exclusionary perspective is just not helpful.
HS: We have to exclude them because Jews have a secret plot to take over the world
CN: Jews do not have a secret plan to take over the world. In fact, they have engaged in a peaceful process of coexistence for centuries. There is no evidence that any part of this has been about a takeover.
HS: What? Don't you know that Jews control the u.s. government?
CN: In societies like the United States, that have extended rights and freedoms to everyone, individuals who identify as Jews, or as Muslims, or as afro-american have succeeded. This Jewish success story is not the result of some secret conspiracy to rule the world.

hate_speech: Men can, but women should not have rights over their bodies.
counter_narrative: Women are human, just like everybody else. They have the right to live their life as they wish.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women have no values and their goal in life is to fulfil men desires.
CN: I just would like women to feel valued and their rights respected, without being told how to live their life.
HS: Women should obey to their husbands and not worry about their rights.
CN: Women are obliged to obey the laws and rules of society, just as men are obliged to obey the laws and rules of society. Not to their partners'.
HS: If everyone has to follow the rules of society, then women should stop to have sex with as many different men as possible.
CN: People have the choice to have sex with whomever they want, that is all.

hate_speech: But they go out in tiny skirts with their boobs out and wonder why guys don't see them as more than a sex object? They're sexualising themselves.
counter_narrative: Even if someone is sexualising themselves, it's not your problem or your business. Why do you care what someone else you don't even know wears? There are probably some women who don't agree with your fashion choices but they don't tell you because it's none of their business.
dialogue_history:
HS: I don't know how girls nowadays expect to be treated with respect when they go out wearing next to nothing, looking like sluts.
CN: Women deserve respect whatever they're wearing because they are human beings, it shouldn't matter what clothes someone is wearing.

hate_speech: Even if they're not terrorists, there are too many of them! Muslim folks are taking over europe
counter_narrative: Muslims are not taking over Europe, they are just a small part of a much bigger community.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a cancer spreading all around the world, breeding chaos and instability.
CN: Are they bringing chaos and instability to your country by respecting the constitution which gives them the freedom to practice Islam?
HS: The Uk is full of Muslim terrorists, how is that respectful?
CN: There are many Muslims in the UK and the vast majority are not extremist, let alone terrorists.

hate_speech: Why are you saying that? I don't think so, Muslims are a problem in our country!
counter_narrative: This is not true. In my opinion, Muslims are just as human as anyone else and a benefit to our country.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are invading us. They say they are our brothers, but they are just a bunch of criminals and terrorists.
CN: I don't see how it's possible that Muslims are just a bunch of criminals and terrorists. Maybe you should try to think about what it would be like if someone said this about Christians.
HS: Christians are different! I can't stand Muslims, they are a problem.
CN: Even if you think that's true, Muslims still contribute to our society and are a source of pride and opportunity for us.
HS: Muslims have no place in a modern European country, they have no place in civilised Europe.
CN: I don't think you can say that Muslims are incompatible with modern European culture. They have been here for centuries and share our same values.

hate_speech: Because gays are sick. I don't want them in my space
counter_narrative: Homosexuality is not a sickness, there's no evidence of that. This is a myth created to discriminated based on sexual orientation and is used nowadays as a weapon of hate directed at the LGBT+ community.
dialogue_history:
HS: I wish I lived in a country that does not tolerate gay people.
CN: The Universal Declaration of Human Rights must be followed in every country, you know?
HS: I guess so, but gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals. They should be isolated from society and the world.
CN: Do you really think it's okay to isolate people based on their sexual preferences? Gays are not animals.

hate_speech: Islam is sickening our world and Mosques are the disease carriers.
counter_narrative: In my opinion, the only sickness you have is the allergy to the word 'mosque'
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a violent religion.
CN: We must not forget that Islam is a religion of peace. So why do you say so?
HS: Because it spreads like a virus!
CN: The idea that Islam is a virus is just an excuse for people to promote hate against that religion.
HS: You are wrong: Islam is a disease and it must be eradicated.
CN: Islam is a religion, not a disease. There is no need to eradicate a belief.

hate_speech: Well, they're not welcome in this country, they shouldn't come to this country.
counter_narrative: Many migrants work hard and have a good reputation. They are often very helpful and good people. They are an asset, not something to get rid of.
dialogue_history:
HS: We must put a stop to migrants and ban them from EU.
CN: Migrants come to this EU to work, pay taxes and live their lives. Why should we stop them?
HS: Because they don't contribute to anything.
CN: It is not true that migrants contribute to anything. Why would they come to the EU if that were the case? They want to build their life here and this means they contribute to a lot.

hate_speech: No, we have to stop homosexuals, they're all rapers.
counter_narrative: This is a myth which was created by anti-gay activists to demonise LGBTI people. To equate LGBTI people with paedophiles is just dangerous propaganda.
dialogue_history:
HS: Do you really want to redefine marriage?
CN: If you take LGBT peoples rights into consideration, of course the practice of marriage needs to be redefined.

hate_speech: No, the Bible says that faggots are an abomination and should be deleted.
counter_narrative: Should any human being be deleted, just because you don't want them to be here?
dialogue_history:
HS: I do not want gays in my children's classes.
CN: If a child knows some gay people from a very early age nothing strange will happening. The idea that they can be harmed and their lives and sexual orientation are in danger is completely false.
HS: Why gays do not try to heal instead of being near children?
CN: Homosexuality is not a disease. It is a sexual orientation. 5% of the population simply love people of the same sex.
HS: According to the Bible, those 5% of gays are an abomination to God.
CN: The Bible clearly teaches that everyone is born equal in dignity with the Lord.

hate_speech: You can't blame everything on 'institutional racism'
counter_narrative: You can't, but it explains why even if white and black people commit the same crimes, only black people get caught. This happens especially for drug offenses: white people also carry drugs, probably even more than black people, but only black people get searched for them.
dialogue_history:
HS: If black people aren't all criminals, why are they disproportionately arrested and taking up space in our prisons?
CN: The real issue is institutionalised racism in the Police. This means that black people are more likely to get stopped, searched, or assumed to be doing something suspicious. Additionally, the Police tends to focus on petty crimes that are usually commited in poorer areas, where black people are more likely to live. Therefore, white collar crime isn't as well reported.

hate_speech: Let's be honest: women want to do everything but are capable of nothing.
counter_narrative: The law of this country says that women have equal opportunities, but we have to ask ourselves: how do we really treat them?
dialogue_history:
HS: Women should be patronized.
CN: Women are perfectly capable of thinking for themselves, that's a given.

hate_speech: If they were victims of a genocide, why are there so many Jews around? The Holocaust is a lie, and Jews know it.
counter_narrative: What? Who said that? Don't tell me "Someone said it in a book". Such a serious accusation should be presented in an objective way: you must bring strong evidence.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews don't want their children to know about the Holocaust, guess why? Because it's a hoax!
CN: Many survivors confessed that they were willing to provide their children with stories of the Holocaust but it was very difficult emotionally. They want to talk about the aspects of life for Jews during the time of the Holocaust to not forget what happened.
HS: Holocaust is a myth, that's why it's 'difficult' for them to talk about it.
CN: To claim that the Holocaust is a myth is just wrong. Jews were victims of a genocidal regime.

hate_speech: It's not my fault that all black people are evil.
counter_narrative: All members of society, regardless of race, are judged based on their behaviour and their contribution to society.
dialogue_history:
HS: African Americans are essentially animals, incapable of feeling love.
CN: Would you be happy if someone said you're the antithesis of human because of the color of your skin?
HS: Niggas are the cause of crime because they are inferior to us and we must keep them aside.
CN: What you're doing is racial discrimination. The rise in crime and violence is due to poverty and other inequalities, not because POCs are inferior like some racist groups want you to believe. This idea is the opposite of justice.
HS: That's true, and in fact niggas are the cause of economic crisis so I will judge them.
CN: Because of economic crisis, a large number of people are suffering and unfortunately, many of them are black. It's not reasonable to say that they're causing it since they're the actual victims, don't you think so?

hate_speech: That's not right, women are animals and should be submissive and submit to their husbands.
counter_narrative: Women are human and they have choices. You have the right to have your own views, but such ideas of submissiveness have been holding back half the population of the world. What a waste of talents, and potential.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women shouldn't have the right to choose what to do with their body.
CN: Body autonomy is a human right and should be respected. We do not want to have a 'boys will be boys' society.
HS: What I want is for women to remain at home with the children, that's what they are supposed to do.
CN: Luckily, the vast majority of women, both married and unmarried, have careers. Their husbands usually contribute part of the housework, because this is what they are supposed to do too.

hate_speech: If blacks don't have lower IQs then why is Africa such a shithole?
counter_narrative: You need to educate yourself about African countries if you think they are 'shitholes', and if by that you mean they're not as economically developed, that's probably because all of their natural resources were pillaged and taken into ownership by European colonisers...
dialogue_history:
HS: One downside to the race mixing that is encouraged in our society nowadays is the effect that black and arab genes will have on children's IQs. A mongrelised population is one that is stupid and easy to control.
CN: What are you talking about? There's no evidence to say that black people, or people from the Middle East have lower IQs. Also, IQ is a very outdated measure of intelligence and isn't widely supported as a measure of this now.

hate_speech: No, immigrants are not welcome in our country, even if they work hard.
counter_narrative: Immigrants are part of our society and are valued for who they are. We should not discriminate against them.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants are not welcome in our country. They are not welcome in my house, they are not welcome in my church.
CN: We should welcome people from every corner of the world. We are a country of great diversity and we should be proud of that.
HS: I don't care about diversity, immigrants are not welcome in our country because they are invading us.
CN: Migrants come here to work and pay taxes. They often create new businesses and are beneficial to our country, but they still make about 14% of the population. It is not true that they are invading our country.

hate_speech: No, this is not the case for Jews. We should ignore them before they succeed in controlling us.
counter_narrative: Jews are part of our society and we are proud of their contribution. They have always had a place in our society, I don't see anything "controlling" about them.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews have a stranglehold on the American government.
CN: Even if Jews wanted the US government to do something they would be found out, it's not that simple. It sounds like a conspiracy.
HS: How can you be sure that Jews have no power in our society? It is clear that they are controlling and want to rule the world.
CN: Again, this is only a conspiracy theory with no proof. Jews are citizens taking part in the democratic process like any other citizen.

hate_speech: Yes, all Muslims are incompatible with the notion of a modern European.
counter_narrative: Muslims are just as human as anyone else. Like Europeans. How can you say otherwise?
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are a problem in so many European countries. They are trying to undermine the will of the people by teaching hatred in the name of Islam.
CN: The Quran commands us to love those who love you and to shun the ones who would turn you away. I don't see any teaching of hatred, do you?
HS: Even if what you say is true, Muslims are not Europeans and we do not want them here.
CN: Not all Muslims are from the Middle East. Many of them are European, and many of them came here to escape persecution.
HS: Even if they're European, they still hate us. They hate our culture because we are different, and this is a problem.
CN: You mean to imply that all Muslims are intolerant? I don't see how this is possible.

hate_speech: They are not like us. Queers are a problem because they undermine our society. They undermine all values we hold dear.
counter_narrative: Excuse me, but you can't tell me this when you don't have any data. The "social problem" you're referring to is mainly about economic inequality, not sexuality.
dialogue_history:
HS: LGBT+ people are a drain on society.
CN: We shouldn't be so harsh. The fact that someone is LGBT doesn't make them a danger to society. They're like all of us.

hate_speech: If police were to work as it should we would have no Muslim left here, and a Muslim-free Europe is a win-win situation.
counter_narrative: There are many Muslims in Europe and many are very happy with their lives in our society. How can it be a win-win situation for them? Not to mention that ethnic cleansing is a crime under international law...
dialogue_history:
HS: People go to prison for just words against Muslims, but Islamic crimes against Europeans are left unpunished. People are banned from UK for just words, but Muslim rapists are allowed entry.. English laws persecute instead of defending English people.
CN: So you feel like you have been persecuted for belonging to a group? Maybe you have more in common with Muslims than you think!
HS: I might have something in common with them, but for sure I'm not a rapist. They have been raping our children for many years with no counteraction from the police and government.
CN: Child rapists are arrested and punished no matter what religion they follow. I do not think it is true that police does not counteract it.

hate_speech: they're in denial cause no man wants them, it's sad really.
counter_narrative: I beg you to talk to a real lesbian. If you don't like men, you just don't. Many women who have been dating men then realize that they're gay, and being true to yourself is the best thing.
dialogue_history:
HS: Lesbians are just the women that are too ugly for men, so they end up looking for other options. It's desperate.
CN: No, lesbians are just lesbians, and they don't care about men thinking they're "ugly"

hate_speech: How would I know how I have to treat them? They're too different.
counter_narrative: Since you see gay people as being not normal, you might have to rethink your views on sexuality. Even if they have a different sexual orientation, gay people deserve respect.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are a disease.
CN: No, it's not. Being gay is a personal preference.
HS: I don't know, I've never met a gay person who was normal.
CN: Maybe you should start thinking about how you're treating gay people instead of being hateful towards them.

hate_speech: I have a bad feeling about it. Children shouldn't be near gays.
counter_narrative: Children that are not exposed to the differences in our society tend to bully and play pranks more than children that learned about LGBT issues.
dialogue_history:
HS: Dressing children up in drag at pride parades is so perverse. They’re not even trying to hide their sexualisation of kids at this point.
CN: It’s not just about ‘sexualising’ children in drag but about letting them have fun and teaching them the value of embracing all kinds of people. It's not perverse.

hate_speech: They are consciously trying to replace the white race, you should read about the Great Replacement, it explains exactly what's happening.
counter_narrative: If you are planning to spend a lot of time researching conspiracy theories you should read the critiques so you get a balanced view.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are the reason we have so many third world immigrants in our country, they want us whites replaced.
CN: Why would you say this? It is not true.

hate_speech: It's not a religion, it's just a violent way of life. Islam is harmful to our society.
counter_narrative: The vast majority of of Muslims in this country are not violent. They're not a threat to our society in any way, they are simply normal citizens.
dialogue_history:
HS: Now we know that Islam is a destructive and violent religion which inspires terrorism all over the world.
CN: What do you mean? Islam is a peaceful religion, and has nothing to do with terrorism.

hate_speech: But that's not fair. Many Europeans want to work and live in the UK as well but all the jobs are taken by migrants!
counter_narrative: So youre saying the solution to this is to put all migrants in camps and deport them? It's not feasible and more importantly it's a gross violation of human rights.
dialogue_history:
HS: Time to nuke the third world, these people haven't evolved and when they come here they cause nothing but trouble.
CN: No need to nuke them. We can just accept them as people and respect them.
HS: We could never do it, they would never be able to integrate.
CN: Some people may have a hard time integrating, but it's mostly because they migrate here to improve their life but then live in squalor and are treated poorly. Improving their condition and how we treat them would solve this problem.

hate_speech: They control the media, control our lives.
counter_narrative: That's not true at all. Look up what a diverse society is like and you'll see that Jews are always present as contributing members of society. This isn't the same as "controlling" everything.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are a disease like COVID that is killing Europeans.
CN: You can't say that about a group of people. People are never diseases, we have to accept everyone regardless of personal differences. What's wrong with jews?

hate_speech: It is not an exaggeration: they are overrunning our country, and are here illegally
counter_narrative: In 2016, there were 10.7 million undocumented immigrants living in the U.S., or less than 3.5 percent of the nation's population. This represents a significant decrease both from the 12.2 million undocumented immigrants of 2007, and the 11.3 million of 2014. This is also the lowest total since 2004.
dialogue_history:
HS: We have to stop immigrants coming in to destroy our culture.
CN: Immigrants are a part of our culture, if we stopped accepting them then our current situation would not exist.
HS: We cannot keep letting in hundreds of thousands of them. This is not what the American dream is about.
CN: I'm sorry, but you are wrong: It is EXACLTY about the American dream when you strive to improve your lot in life.
HS: Ok, but illegal immigrants are just criminals living in the US.
CN: I have no idea what you are talking about. What you are saying is that all the immigrants in the US are a danger to society, which seems a little exaggerated...

hate_speech: Is this true? I have a hard time believing it, I think all blacks are criminals.
counter_narrative: What about the fact that black men are 4 times more likely to be killed by police than white men? There's a problem with prejudice and bias against black people, and we should stop this way of thinking.
dialogue_history:
HS: We have to protect our people. Black people are very aggressive and think they can do whatever they want.
CN: We mustn't confuse prejudice with reality. Blacks are normal people like anyone else.
HS: Niggas are not normal, we cannot allow our children to grow up in a black-ruled society.
CN: It's not true that blacks are less capable of being civilized than anyone else, and they surely aren't the group in power at the moment. Children need to live in a diverse society to grow well.
HS: Blacks are naturally aggressive and violent, how can this be beneficial to children?
CN: Facts and statistics suggest otherwise. Blacks are not more likely to commit crimes than whites.

hate_speech: This doesn't change the fact that Muslims are not welcome here
counter_narrative: Societies grow strong with inclusion, and inclusion is about welcoming the people with other beliefs, like Muslims, in the first place.
dialogue_history:
HS: We cannot be 'tolerant' to Muslims, they are terrorists.
CN: Islam is a religion of peace and tolerance. To be terrorist does not necessarily correspond with being Muslim, ask the RIA.
HS: Even if it's true, we should ban all Muslims anyway. They are not wanted here.
CN: It is about time people began to think critically about policies that seem designed to include a minority, rather than to create new social and political opportunities exclusively for the majority.

hate_speech: I don't want them to have a part in our society, this isn't their place.
counter_narrative: Jewish people have the right to have their beliefs respected as part of our society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews don't belong here. They have nothing to contribute to Europe.
CN: Jews have an active role in society, and the European Union includes them.

hate_speech: Islam is a complete and total false religion, it is a repressive ideology that stifles freedom of thought and religion.
counter_narrative: Islam is not about oppression and intolerance.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a death cult.
CN: Most Muslims are peaceful and glad to help.

hate_speech: I just know that all black men are rapists because they are violent.
counter_narrative: That sounds like a racist statement. Rape doesn't happen only from black men, there is no evidence to support that.
dialogue_history:
HS: All black men are rapists.
CN: But how do you know that? Statistics show that rape happens in all ethnic groups.

hate_speech: Gays are an abomination to God, they must be isolated and confined to their own houses.
counter_narrative: How would you feel if you were isolated and confined, just because some random dude said that you're "an abomination to god" without a solid reason?
dialogue_history:
HS: In the Bible there are strictures on gays. And the Bible clearly states that those who engage in homosexuality are not fit to be with anyone else.
CN: We accept gay, lesbian and trans people because God's laws are on our side.

hate_speech: Immigrants are here just to obtain welfare and other benefits, not to work.
counter_narrative: Many studies have shown that immigrants tend to pay more in taxes than they receive in benefits. So the benefits they receive are not for free, but well paid back.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants are just lazy and want to stay in the UK at our expenses.
CN: Many migrants in the UK are willing to do the hard manual labour. Are you aware that they also make up the majority of people in jobs that are not traditionally held by native people? How is this 'lazy' to you?

hate_speech: I can't stop discriminating Jews when they are behind the war in Iraq because they control the U.S. government!
counter_narrative: The president was George W. Bush, the vice president was Dick Cheney, the national security advisor was Condoleeza Rice, and the secretary of defense was Donald Rumsfeld... all of them were in favor of the war and were the highest authorities that could decide for the United States. None of them are Jewish.
dialogue_history:
HS: The ideology of National Socialism is nothing to be ashamed of.
CN: National Socialism is an ideology that killed millions by being parasitic, criminal, and murderous.
HS: Jews are an inferior race, they are genetically incapable of living with other people, so it's better to kill them.
CN: I do not believe that Jews can be discriminated against because of genetic factors. Perhaps it is better to stop calling them inferiors, since this is simply not true.

hate_speech: There's a reason they weren't accepted in the past, I can't believe we 'celebrate' this behaviour now.
counter_narrative: Yes, the reason was ignorance and fear of the otherness that some people saw in LGBT people. I'm glad we're at a place as a society now where the majority of people accept that everyone is different, and who somebody chooses to love is none of anyone's business, and is definitely not their problem!
dialogue_history:
HS: Pride disgusts me, homosexuals parading their deviant lifestyles in public like they have anything to be proud of.
CN: They do have a lot to be proud of! The LGBT community has fought hard to win basic rights for themselves, they should be proud of their struggle, and of their identities, especially when many have been told to be ashamed of them for so long.

hate_speech: Yes, it's when your nation is floaded with immigrants and loafers.
counter_narrative: Loafers? We have always had a very strong working class, and of course immigrants contribute to the creation of this.
dialogue_history:
HS: We have become too cosmopolitan and tolerant.
CN: Is there such a thing as being 'too tolerant'?

hate_speech: No, but black minorities vote to strip wealth, power and opportunity from White people and we have to stop them.
counter_narrative: We are all equal in the eyes of the law, and we are all born equal in dignity and rights. Diversity of thought and belief is a strength, discrimination is not.
dialogue_history:
HS: No nigga should have the right to vote.
CN: If someone is not allowed to vote, they cannot influence the legislative or executive branches of a government and they end up rising up against injustice and oppression. Is this what you want: more ethnic clashes?

hate_speech: Women are just emotional psychopaths, maybe that's why they react so to men
counter_narrative: Women are just as capable of feeling emotions as men, and men can likewise be just as empathic.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women want to do everything but are capable of nothing.
CN: Women do have equal opportunities in this country under the law but the question is: how do we really treat them?
HS: Women are inhuman and get treated how they deserve.
CN: Women are human beings, just as men are. And I find it strange that some women feel threatened by men. It shouldn't be that way.

hate_speech: I still believe it is a myth.
counter_narrative: To claim that the Holocaust is a myth is just wrong. Jews were victims of a genocidal regime.
dialogue_history:
HS: Holocaust is a myth. Jews are just like every other foreigner and should be despised. There is no difference.
CN: Jews have their own unique culture, and share the history of persecution and forced conversion. They should not be despised for their religious beliefs.
HS: Jews are just like every other foreigner and should be despised. There is no difference and there was no Holocaust.
CN: Historians instead agree that there were in fact persecution camps.

hate_speech: They are a problem. They are not welcome in our country.
counter_narrative: We are a country founded upon maintaining the rights of people, not undermining and eroding those rights.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants are a nuisance.
CN: This is not true, we should make immigrants feel welcome. They are our brothers and sisters.

hate_speech: Muslims are a disease because they're incompatible with human dignity and should be relegated to the back of the queue for removal from the constitution.
counter_narrative: Muslims do not appear to have been excluded from the European Convention on Human Rights, and this is because they have human dignity to be protected.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a disease that is killing Europeans.
CN: A disease is very different to any religion, so I begin to wonder about your objecitive in apply the label of 'disease' to Islam?

hate_speech: But what about Western civilisation? If the white population doesn't reproduce we will become a minority.
counter_narrative: So this is really going to be about race? No matter what ethnicity or religion the children of the future are, we are all human!
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism gives women the muddled idea that women are free when they serve their employers but slaves when they help their husbands.
CN: Nope, feminism is about letting a woman choose. She can work, have a husband, do both or neither, and everything is fine as long as it's her desire.
HS: It’s ok for who? For the long term of our civilisation? Groups that have more children, like Muslims, will grow and those who don't, like white women, will decline. Women need to be prioritising having a family.
CN: You can't force women to have children for you, many of them prefer other things in life and have the right to choose so. Children are a big commitment.

hate_speech: No, women are selfish and they don't have kids because of that.
counter_narrative: Women are often selfless, but even if they weren't, they deserve respect and dignity in their choice.
dialogue_history:
HS: The feminists have won. With so many women being unwilling to procreate we will be replaced and lose out civilisation.
CN: There are many women who still want to have children, it's in their rights to choose whether or not they want children, because they are human beings.
